analyzed: cig shes dag kyang rang rang gi dkyil 'khor mnyes par byed pa'i phyir dam tshig sems dpar 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: Although each of them is a pledge being who pleases their own mandala,

original: 'on kyang dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po mnyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yang dag par byung ba'i mnyes pa ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa la thogs pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po mnyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yang dag par byung ba'i mnyes pa ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa la thogs pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: nevertheless, the pleasure that arises from the concentration of the unequaled faculties of faith and so forth is not impeded for Yamantaka and so forth.

original: gang gi phyir dad pas bkug la dad pa dang ldan pa ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dad pas bkug la dad pa dang ldan pa ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
translated: This is because those who are summoned by faith are endowed with faith and they begin to make effort.

original: brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar 'jog go //
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar 'jog go //
translated: Those who begin to make effort establish mindfulness.

original: dran pa 'jog pa rnams ni dgug pa la sems mnyam par 'jug go //
analyzed: dran pa 'jog pa rnams ni dgug pa la sems mnyam par 'jug go //
translated: The minds of those who are to be bound are brought into equipoise by the placement of mindfulness.

original: mnyam par 'jog pa'i sems kyis ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te dbang po rnams kyi rim pa 'di ni gshin rje gshed pa la sogs pa la mtshungs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: mnyam par 'jog pa'i sems kyis ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te dbang po rnams kyi rim pa 'di ni gshin rje gshed pa la sogs pa la mtshungs pa nyid yin no //
translated: By the mind in equipoise, one knows reality just as it is. This order of the faculties is the same for Yamântaka and so forth.

original: de ltar na bzhi pa ni dam tshig gi sems dpa' yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na bzhi pa ni dam tshig gi sems dpa' yin no //
translated: Thus, the fourth is the pledge-being.

original: de ltar khro bo rnams kyi 'khor phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba yin pas na /
analyzed: de ltar khro bo rnams kyi 'khor phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba yin pas na /
translated: Thus, the wrathful ones have a perfect retinue.

original: 'dir rnam par dag pa bshad pa yin no//
analyzed: 'dir rnam par dag pa bshad pa yin no//
translated: Thus, the purity is explained here.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / lha mo rnams kyi 'khor rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / lha mo rnams kyi 'khor rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid yin no //
translated: The purity of the retinue of the transcendent lords and goddesses has already been explained.

original: gdon pa'i sngags de rnams kyi bshad pa ni bshad pa las gsal ba nyid du 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: gdon pa'i sngags de rnams kyi bshad pa ni bshad pa las gsal ba nyid du 'byung ba yin no //
translated: The explanation of those mantras to be recited occurs clearly in the commentary.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid can gyi gsang ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid can gyi gsang ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
translated: The secret is Vajradhara, who is the nature of the body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bas na gsang ba yang yin la 'dus pa yang yin te tshogs par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na gsang ba yang yin la 'dus pa yang yin te tshogs par bshad pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is secret and also a gathering, that is, an assembly.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de'i byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de'i byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
translated: It is the consecration of the mandala of the samadhi of all the Tathagatas.

original: de ston par byed pa'i le'u'i gzhung rdzogs so //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i le'u'i gzhung rdzogs so //
translated: The text of the chapter which teaches that is complete.

original: le'u dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the first chapter.

original: // / @173a * //  da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnyis pa don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi le'u ston te //
analyzed: // / @173a * //  da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnyis pa don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi le'u ston te //
translated: Now, from “Then, ” etc., the second chapter on the ultimate mind of enlightenment is taught.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi zhes bya ba ni sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi zhes bya ba ni sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: “ Of body, speech, and mind” is the nature of the emanation body, the beatific body, and the truth body.

original: de nyid kyis na mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na mchog go //
translated: It is supreme because of that.

original: de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang ba'o ;
analyzed: de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang ba'o ;
translated: That is the secret of all the Tathagatas.

original: / de ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: / de ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is that?

original: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
translated: The unsurpassed spirit of enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba ste 'di las gong na med pas na bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste 'di las gong na med pas na bla na med pa'o //
translated: It is unsurpassed because there is nothing higher than this.

analyzed: 'dir 'og nas byang chub kyi bdag nyid can gyi sems bya ba man chad 'dir 'od de yang rigs pas dmigs su med pa yin te /
translated: Here, the spirit of enlightenment, which is the nature of enlightenment, is not perceived by the intellect, as will be stated below.

original: de ni ngo bo nyid gcig pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul nyid dmigs su med do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de ni ngo bo nyid gcig pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul nyid dmigs su med do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The nature of non-duality, which is a single essence, is not perceived.

original: de ltar na 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, this is the statement of the spirit of enlightenment of Vajrasattva.

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'byin pa'i rim pa bor te /🔽sems lus lta bu dang zhes bya ba'i nye ba'i rim pa 'di nyid la brten nas /
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'byin pa'i rim pa bor te / sems lus lta bu dang zhes bya ba'i nye ba'i rim pa 'di nyid la brten nas /
translated: Now, after that, etc. ,

analyzed: thugs kyi 'og tu sku'i ngo bo nyid rnams par snang mdzad kyi byang chub kyi sems gsungs pa yin no //
translated: the stage of creation is omitted, and based on this very proximate stage, the spirit of enlightenment of Vairocana, the nature of the body, is stated below the mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gang du mngon par rtogs shing snang ba'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid can du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ste me long lta bu'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gang du mngon par rtogs shing snang ba'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid can du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ste me long lta bu'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The concentration in which all the Tathagatas realize and become the nature of the vajra of appearance is the mirror-like concentration.

analyzed: dngos po thams cad ces bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa ste / de dang bral zhing gzugs kyi phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams ni me long lta bu dang / gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa //

original: zhes bya ba gnyi gas bdag med par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gnyi gas bdag med par bshad pa yin no //
translated: The mirror-like concentration is free from them, and the aggregates of form, elements, and sense-fields are explained as selfless by both the mirror-like concentration and the statement, “free from the duality of grasped and grasper.”

original: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir //🔽chos la bdag med mnyam nyid pas //
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir // chos la bdag med mnyam nyid pas //
translated: In order to clarify that,

original: zhes bya ba la gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gsungs pa yin no //
translated: it is said, “the equality of the selflessness of phenomena.”

original: rang sems zhes bya ba ni khyad par gzhan yang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rang sems zhes bya ba ni khyad par gzhan yang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The statement, “one’s own mind,” is another specification.

original: gzod nas ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni gdod ma nyid nas brtags pa'i rnam pa ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gzod nas ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni gdod ma nyid nas brtags pa'i rnam pa ma skyes pa'o //
translated: “Primordially unborn” means that the aspect of the imagined is unborn from the beginning.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of emptiness.

original: zhes bya ba ni de nyid brten par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de nyid brten par byas pa yin no //
translated: This is the very basis of the vajra-mind.

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas bskyod par byang chub kyis sems gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas bskyod par byang chub kyis sems gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Now, from “Then, the vajra of mind” and so forth, the vajra of mind is taught.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zad par mi 'gyur zhing nyams par mi 'gyur la chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid gang du mi phyed pa'i gzugs su bzhugs pa @173b de ni mi bskyod pa lta bu nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes don gyi
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zad par mi 'gyur zhing nyams par mi 'gyur la chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid gang du mi phyed pa'i gzugs su bzhugs pa @173b de ni mi bskyod pa lta bu nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes don gyi
translated: The samadhi that is like Akshobhya is where all the Tathagatas, without exception, abide in an indivisible form, the nature of the gnosis of the dharmadhatu, without exhaustion and without decline.

original: bshad pa'o // dngos po 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dngos po rnams so //
analyzed: bshad pa'o // dngos po 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dngos po rnams so //
translated: The meaning of this is explained by “these things” and so forth. These things are things with the nature of the outer and inner.

original: ma skyes pas zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pas zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: “Unborn” means non-existent.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas na chos so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas na chos so //
translated: Dharma means that which holds its own characteristics.

original: de med pas na chos nyid med pa'o ;
analyzed: de med pas na chos nyid med pa'o ;
translated: Since that does not exist, the nature of phenomena does not exist.

original: / de lta na ni med pa'i stong ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: / de lta na ni med pa'i stong ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, it follows that it is the emptiness of non-existence.

original: nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa //
translated: Selfless like space.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te dmigs su med pa'i ye shes tsam zhes bya ba don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te dmigs su med pa'i ye shes tsam zhes bya ba don to //
translated: The meaning is: the mere pristine wisdom that is not an object of perception.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi byang chub kyi tshul gsungs pa /
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi byang chub kyi tshul gsungs pa /
translated: The way of enlightenment of Ratnasaṃbhava is stated:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa nyid rdo rje ste mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa nyid rdo rje ste mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: The vajra of selflessness of all tathāgatas is the aspect of sameness.

original: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: the samādhi called that.

original: chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing //
translated: All phenomena are unreal.

original: zhes bya ba ni shes bya'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shes bya'i tshul gyis so //
translated: The meaning is: by the way of being known.

original: chos kyi mtshan ni gang gi phyir chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid /
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan ni gang gi phyir chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid /
translated: The characteristics of phenomena are the characteristics of phenomena.

original: gzugs ni gzugs su rung ba'o ;
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs su rung ba'o ;
translated: Form is that which is suitable as form.

original: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de rnam par spangs pa'o //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de rnam par spangs pa'o //
translated: And so on. That is abandoned.🔽And that is also:

original: de yang / bya ba dang ni nyer 'dren kun //
analyzed: de yang / bya ba dang ni nyer 'dren kun //
translated: All actions and approaches

original: phung po la sogs khyad par du //
analyzed: phung po la sogs khyad par du //
translated: Are distinguished in the aggregates and so on.

original: mtshan nyid de yang de nyid de //
analyzed: mtshan nyid de yang de nyid de //
translated: That characteristic is also that.

original: des na 'di yang mtshan nyid bral //
analyzed: des na 'di yang mtshan nyid bral //
translated: Therefore, this is also free from characteristics.

original: zhes bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa'o //
translated: Thus it is explained.

original: de nyid kyis na bdag med chos las te chos rnams bdag med pa ma yin par dgag pa la brten pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi sems pas kun du byung ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na bdag med chos las te chos rnams bdag med pa ma yin par dgag pa la brten pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi sems pas kun du byung ba ste /
translated: And by that very thing, from the dharma of selflessness, i.e., based on the negation of the selflessness of phenomena, it arises from the mind of sameness.

original: de rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is their intrinsic reality.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i byang chub kyi sems gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i byang chub kyi sems gsungs pa /
translated: The bodhicitta of Amitābha is stated:

original: ye shes nyid 'od zer yin te des na sems can gyi don la so sor rtog pas na sgron ma'o /
analyzed: ye shes nyid 'od zer yin te des na sems can gyi don la so sor rtog pas na sgron ma'o /
translated: Wisdom itself is the light ray, and thus it is the lamp because it discerns the aims of sentient beings.

original: de nyid rdo rje ltar gnyis su med pa'i gzugs can yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni tshe dpag med lta bur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje ltar gnyis su med pa'i gzugs can yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni tshe dpag med lta bur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That very thing is the samādhi that has the form of nondual vajra-like reality. The meaning is that it is like Amitāyus.

original: ma skyes pa ste bems po'i chos la ngo bo med pa zhes pa btags pa'i dngos po med cing de la sgom pa yang med pa'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa ste bems po'i chos la ngo bo med pa zhes pa btags pa'i dngos po med cing de la sgom pa yang med pa'o //
translated: It is unborn, and the meaning of “having no intrinsic reality” in regard to the phenomena of matter is that it is a nominal nonentity and that it is not meditation.

original: 'on na da ltar ci zhig yod ce na /🔽nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: 'on na da ltar ci zhig yod ce na / nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis //
translated: Well then, what is it now?🔽It is stated:

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is applied in the manner of space.

original: dmigs su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis so //
analyzed: dmigs su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis so //
translated: by the method of non-apprehensible intuition.

original: de ltar sngar bshad pa'i dngos po ste /
analyzed: de ltar sngar bshad pa'i dngos po ste /
translated: Thus, the above-mentioned thing

original: gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du rab tu bsgrags shing so sor rtog go zhes pa'o //🔽gdon mi za bar grub pa'i byang chub kyi @174a * //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du rab tu bsgrags shing so sor rtog go zhes pa'o // gdon mi za bar grub pa'i byang chub kyi @174a * //
translated: is proclaimed and discriminated as the nature of non-duality.

original: tshul gsungs pa /
analyzed: tshul gsungs pa /
translated: The method of inevitable enlightenment is stated:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa ni bdag nyid kyis sems can gyi don bya'o zhes phrag dog rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo bya ba sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa ni bdag nyid kyis sems can gyi don bya'o zhes phrag dog rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo bya ba sgrub pa'o //
translated: The subjugation of all the Tathagatas is the benefit of sentient beings by oneself, the accomplishment of action, the nature of the purification of envy.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje ste gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid can yin te de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje ste gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid can yin te de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: That itself is the vajra, having the nature of non-duality. The samadhi called by that name is to be supplied.

original: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
translated: The nature of phenomena is clear light.

original: zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: This is the nature of mind.

original: gzod nas dag pa zhes bya ba ni bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bos gdod ma nyid nas dag pa yin gyi da ltar ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzod nas dag pa zhes bya ba ni bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bos gdod ma nyid nas dag pa yin gyi da ltar ni ma yin no //
translated: “Pure from the beginning” means that the nature of the gnosis of accomplishing activities is pure from the very beginning, not just now.

original: de nyid kyis na ston pas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na ston pas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: For that very reason, the Teacher said, “All sentient beings have the essence of the tathāgata.”

original: nam mkha' bzhin bya ba ni dmigs su med pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin bya ba ni dmigs su med pa'o //
translated: “Like space” means it is not an object of apprehension.

original: byang chub med cing zhes bya ba ni 'di las tha mi dad pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub med cing zhes bya ba ni 'di las tha mi dad pa'o //
translated: “There is no enlightenment” means it is not different from this.

original: mngon par rtogs pa med ces bya ba ni lam tha dad par gyur pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa med ces bya ba ni lam tha dad par gyur pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: “There is no realization” means that there is also no separate path.

original: byang chub dang lam gnyi ga yang de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub dang lam gnyi ga yang de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because both enlightenment and the path are its essence.

original: de lta mod kyi goms par bslabs pa'i gnas skabs su mi gsal ba nyid kyis na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de la lam gyi bden pa zhes bshad la /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi goms par bslabs pa'i gnas skabs su mi gsal ba nyid kyis na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de la lam gyi bden pa zhes bshad la /
translated: Nevertheless, in the phase of training in familiarization, that nondual gnosis is called the truth of the path because it is not clear.

original: gsal ba'i gnas skabs su ni 'bras bu zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gsal ba'i gnas skabs su ni 'bras bu zhes bya'o //
translated: In the phase of clarity, it is called the result.

original: de nyid kyis na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na /
translated: Therefore,

original: 'dir zhi ba dang srid pa'i ngo bo 'dir //
analyzed: 'dir zhi ba dang srid pa'i ngo bo 'dir //
translated: Here, the nature of peace and existence

original: chos nyid kyi ni dbye ba 'ga' yang med //
analyzed: chos nyid kyi ni dbye ba 'ga' yang med //
translated: Is not divided in the least by reality.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig su bcad pa smos pa yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig su bcad pa smos pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is stated in the verse, and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ngo mtshar du 'gyur pa sngon du 'gro ba'i ched du brjod pa'i thabs kyis sngar bshad pa'i don ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ngo mtshar du 'gyur pa sngon du 'gro ba'i ched du brjod pa'i thabs kyis sngar bshad pa'i don ston pa yin te /
translated: Then, with the words beginning with “then,” the method of expression with the prior amazement is taught, and the previously explained meaning is shown.

original: ae ma'o sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni kun du bzang po dang / byang chub kyi sems gnyis tha mi dad pas de la phyag 'tshal ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ae ma'o sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni kun du bzang po dang / byang chub kyi sems gnyis tha mi dad pas de la phyag 'tshal ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “Amazing Buddha” is the statement of homage to the indivisibility of the two bodhicittas.

original: de bzhin du 'di'i 'og ma rnams pa yang byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di'i 'og ma rnams pa yang byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad par shes par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, the following should be understood as indivisible from bodhicitta.

original: byang chub sems ni rab bskor ba //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rab bskor ba //
translated: The bodhicitta is fully turned.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'og gnas gdul bya'i dbang gis bya ba 'dir yang byang chub kyi bdag nyid can gyi sems yin pas na byang chub sems so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'og gnas gdul bya'i dbang gis bya ba 'dir yang byang chub kyi bdag nyid can gyi sems yin pas na byang chub sems so //
translated: Here also, the mind that has the nature of enlightenment is the enlightenment mind.

original: snying po zhes bya ba ni nye bar blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: snying po zhes bya ba ni nye bar blang bar bya'o //
translated: The essence is to be taken up.

original: gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la legs so zhes par bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la legs so zhes par bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Immediately after the request, the permission is taught, beginning with “all bodhisattvas.”

original: yongs su rtog pa @174b zhes bya ba ni kun nas 'dri ba'i bsam pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su rtog pa @174b zhes bya ba ni kun nas 'dri ba'i bsam pa'o //
translated: The thought of thorough inquiry is the thought of complete questioning.

original: thugs kyis mkhyen nas zhes bya ba ni dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes nyid kyis so //🔽sems lus lta bu dang zhes bya ba ni brtags pa'i rnam pa'i sems dgag pa'o //
analyzed: thugs kyis mkhyen nas zhes bya ba ni dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes nyid kyis so // sems lus lta bu dang zhes bya ba ni brtags pa'i rnam pa'i sems dgag pa'o //
translated: Knowing with his mind means with the wisdom of the pure mundane state.🔽The mind is like the body means the negation of the mind that has the aspect of an imagined form.

original: lus sems lta bu dang zhes bya ba ni brtags pa'i bems po'i lus dgag pa ste 'dis ni sems dang lus khyad par med par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: lus sems lta bu dang zhes bya ba ni brtags pa'i bems po'i lus dgag pa ste 'dis ni sems dang lus khyad par med par bshad pa yin no //
translated: The body is like the mind means the negation of the body that is an imagined inanimate object. This explains that the mind and body are not different.

original: sems tshig tu brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ngag dang sems kyang khyad par med par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: sems tshig tu brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ngag dang sems kyang khyad par med par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The phrase mind spoken in words and so forth indicates that speech and mind are not different.

original: de ltar na de ni khams gsum po rnams pa bcas pa ni shes pa tsam gyi ngo bo nyid yin no zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na de ni khams gsum po rnams pa bcas pa ni shes pa tsam gyi ngo bo nyid yin no zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it shows that the three realms are the nature of mere consciousness.

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas nyan pa po de rnams dngos po'i ngo bo nyid ci ltar gnas pa bzhin du de nyid rjes su brjod pa yin par sdud par byed pas smras pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas nyan pa po de rnams dngos po'i ngo bo nyid ci ltar gnas pa bzhin du de nyid rjes su brjod pa yin par sdud par byed pas smras pa yin te /
translated: Now, the compiler says the following, beginning with the phrase then, in order to express the reality of the listeners just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs nam mkha' lta bur zhes bya ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul du yang dag par sbyar nas ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba ched kar brjod do zhes bya ba smras
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs nam mkha' lta bur zhes bya ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul du yang dag par sbyar nas ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba ched kar brjod do zhes bya ba smras
translated: Having perfectly applied the nature of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas in the manner of nondual wisdom, which is like space, he uttered this exclamation, Excellent!

original: so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: ae ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ae ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The statement Amazing! and so forth.

original: brtags pa'i rnam pa med pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de'i skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis na dngos po gnas par gyur pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: brtags pa'i rnam pa med pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de'i skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis na dngos po gnas par gyur pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The non-existence of the aspect of the imagined and so forth is not the abiding of things in the manner of non-production.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa skye ba'i de ni rab tu bsgrags shing bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa skye ba'i de ni rab tu bsgrags shing bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That is proclaimed and explained as the production of the various aspects.

original: de ltar na 'dis ni chos nyid kyis spyir byang chub kyi sems bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar na 'dis ni chos nyid kyis spyir byang chub kyi sems bshad nas /
translated: Thus, this explains the enlightenment mind in general by way of reality.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas drug po'i byang chub kyi sems re re nas gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas drug po'i byang chub kyi sems re re nas gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Then, the enlightenment mind of each of the six buddhas is stated beginning with the words, Then, Vajradhara.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul ting nge 'dzin gang du rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur pa de la rdo rje 'chang ba lta bu nyid du snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul ting nge 'dzin gang du rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur pa de la rdo rje 'chang ba lta bu nyid du snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
translated: The samādhi in which all tathāgatas fully awaken is the vajra-like samādhi. He entered into union with it in the manner of Vajradhara.

original: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni med par dgag pa'i tshul du bsgom pa rnams kyi dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni med par dgag pa'i tshul du bsgom pa rnams kyi dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Non-entity is the non-entity of those who cultivate in the manner of a negation.

original: de ni gzung ba la sogs pa'i tshul du rnam par brtags pa'i sgom pa de yang bsgom pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni gzung ba la sogs pa'i tshul du rnam par brtags pa'i sgom pa de yang bsgom pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not the cultivation of the imagination of what is unreal in the manner of apprehended object, etc.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽de ltar zhes pa'i phyir dngos po de nyid yang dag par rig pa yin @175a * //
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin pa'i phyir ro // de ltar zhes pa'i phyir dngos po de nyid yang dag par rig pa yin @175a * //
translated: because it is attachment to what is not real.

original: par bshad pas dngos po med par 'gyur te brtags pa ni dngos po med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: par bshad pas dngos po med par 'gyur te brtags pa ni dngos po med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is said that “that very entity is the correct view,” it is not non-entity, because the imagination is an entity.

original: ma yin par dgag pa la brten pas ni de las kyang yang dag par rig par bshad pa don dam par spong ba las gang tha dad par gyur pa'i sgom pa po'i bya bar 'dod pa ni bsgom pa yin la ;
analyzed: ma yin par dgag pa la brten pas ni de las kyang yang dag par rig par bshad pa don dam par spong ba las gang tha dad par gyur pa'i sgom pa po'i bya bar 'dod pa ni bsgom pa yin la ;
translated: Since it is based on an affirming negation, it is said to be the correct view, and it is cultivation, because it is the activity of the cultivator that is distinct from the abandonment of the ultimate.

original: / gdul bya'i dbang gis dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis so //
analyzed: / gdul bya'i dbang gis dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis so //
translated: It is the cultivation of the pure mundane knowledge in the manner of the pure mundane knowledge, in accordance with the disciples.

original: de la le'u 'di'i don nyid ni //
analyzed: de la le'u 'di'i don nyid ni //
translated: The meaning of this chapter

original: snying rjes 'jig rten 'di ni ma lus pa //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: snying rjes 'jig rten 'di ni ma lus pa // zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi bshad pa yin no //
translated: Out of compassion, this entire world🔽This is the explanation of the two verses beginning with “out of compassion. ”

original: le'u gnyis pa'i 'grel ba'o /
analyzed: le'u gnyis pa'i 'grel ba'o /
translated: This concludes the commentary on the second chapter.

original: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni le'u gsum pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni le'u gsum pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Now, the third chapter begins with “then. ”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phro ba nyid rlan dang bcas pa nyid yin pas na sprin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phro ba nyid rlan dang bcas pa nyid yin pas na sprin no //
translated: It is a cloud because it is the moisture of the emanation of all the Tathāgatas.

original: de'i bkod pa ni tshogs so //
analyzed: de'i bkod pa ni tshogs so //
translated: Its array is the collection.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' ste ting nge 'dzin de la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' ste ting nge 'dzin de la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That itself is the vajra, which is Vajrasattva. The meaning is: in that samādhi.

original: byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags gsungs pa ni aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags gsungs pa ni aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The mantra for blessing the cultivation of the thought of awakening is stated: Oṃ śūnyatā-jñāna-vajra-svabhāvātmako ’haṃ.

original: aom zhes bya ba ni lha'i sku'o sh'u nya t'a ni stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba ni lha'i sku'o sh'u nya t'a ni stong pa nyid de /
translated: Oṃ is the divine body. Śūnyatā is emptiness.

original: de nyid ni dzny'a na ste ye shes so //
analyzed: de nyid ni dzny'a na ste ye shes so //
translated: That itself is jñāna, which is wisdom.

original: de nyid ni badzr'a ste rdo rje yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni badzr'a ste rdo rje yin no //
translated: That itself is vajra.

original: sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba ni de'i ngo bo nyid kyi bdag nyid can ni bdag go zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba ni de'i ngo bo nyid kyi bdag nyid can ni bdag go zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And that is as stated by Master Nāgārjuna:

original: de yang / dngos las stong pa gzhan ma yin //
analyzed: de yang / dngos las stong pa gzhan ma yin //
translated: Emptiness is not something other than things.

original: de med par yang dngos po med //🔽ces slob dpon klu sgrub kyis ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de med par yang dngos po med // ces slob dpon klu sgrub kyis ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: Without that, things do not exist.

original: gzhi'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba ste chos 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gzhi'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba ste chos 'byung ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the basic maṇḍala is “in the realm of space,” which is the source of phenomena.

original: de'i dbus gnas par sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni yi ge bhr'um gyi 'khor lo las byung ba'i rin po che'i cod pa na gyi rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i dbus gnas par sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni yi ge bhr'um gyi 'khor lo las byung ba'i rin po che'i cod pa na gyi rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: “In the middle of that, the buddha maṇḍala” is the maṇḍala that arises from the syllable bhrūṃ, which is the transformation of Vairocana in the form of a jeweled diadem.

original: de yang bhr'um gyi 'khor lo las byung rig ma dang bcas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad yan lag las yang dag byung zhes ji skad bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de yang bhr'um gyi 'khor lo las byung rig ma dang bcas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad yan lag las yang dag byung zhes ji skad bshad pa'o //
translated: And that is as stated: “Vairocana with the consort arisen from the wheel of bhrūṃ, arisen from the limbs.”

original: sangs rgyas nyid 'bar ba ste de dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer mnga' ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid 'bar ba ste de dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer mnga' ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is the Buddha, the blazing one, who possesses the light rays equal to that.

original: de nyid kyis na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na /
translated: And for that very reason,

original: 'od zer sna lngas kun du khyab //
analyzed: 'od zer sna lngas kun du khyab //
translated: he is pervaded by the five-colored light rays.

original: ces bya'o // de yang /🔽thub dbang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i //
analyzed: ces bya'o // de yang / thub dbang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i //
translated: And that is explained as follows:🔽The light-circle of the Lord of Sages

original: zer gyis phyogs tshogs ma lus kun du khyab //🔽ces ji skad bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zer gyis phyogs tshogs ma lus kun du khyab // ces ji skad bshad pa'o //
translated: pervades all the directions without exception with its rays.

original: kun nas yongs su zlum por @175b te ;
analyzed: kun nas yongs su zlum por @175b te ;
translated: It is completely round on all sides,

original: / zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang zlum po ste /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang zlum po ste /
translated: that is, it is round on the outside and inside.

original: dbus su ni zur bzhi ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: dbus su ni zur bzhi ba nyid yin no //
translated: In the middle, it is square.

original: 'dod par bya ba yin pas na 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod par bya ba yin pas na 'dod pa'o //
translated: It is desirable, thus it is desire.

original: de nyid ni rnam par dag pa nyid kyi tshul gyis goms shing bslab par bya ba yin pas na yon tan no //
analyzed: de nyid ni rnam par dag pa nyid kyi tshul gyis goms shing bslab par bya ba yin pas na yon tan no //
translated: It is a virtue because it is to be cultivated and trained in by the method of purification itself.

original: lnga ni gzugs la sogs pa ste des khyab pa'o //
analyzed: lnga ni gzugs la sogs pa ste des khyab pa'o //
translated: The five are form, etc., and it is pervaded by them.

original: mchod pa rnam pa lnga ni lha bshos la sogs pa ste de rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa rnam pa lnga ni lha bshos la sogs pa ste de rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: The five kinds of offerings are food offerings, etc., and it is adorned by them.

original: de'i phyir / gzugs sogs yul rnams rnam par dag pa ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gzugs sogs yul rnams rnam par dag pa ni //
translated: Therefore,🔽The objects, forms and so forth, are pure.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smos pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the verse beginning with “The pure objects such as form” is stated.🔽In brief, it is thus, etc.

original: de ni mdor na de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa drug po'i sku mdog la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni mdor na de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa drug po'i sku mdog la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The colors of the six transcendent lords are stated.

original: gzugs zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'o //
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'o //
translated: “Form” is the Buddha’s body.

original: dbus su zhes bya ba ni dbus ma'i gdan la'o //
analyzed: dbus su zhes bya ba ni dbus ma'i gdan la'o //
translated: “In the middle” is on the central seat.

original: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni yid kyis sam rngul tshon gyis so //
analyzed: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni yid kyis sam rngul tshon gyis so //
translated: “One should meditate” means with the mind or with colored powders.

original: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni lha'i sku'o //🔽sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni lha'i sku'o // sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o //
translated: “The great seal” is the deity’s body.

original: zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: “Marked with body, speech, and mind” means blessed by those.

original: de dag ni 'di'i 'og ma rnams la shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni 'di'i 'og ma rnams la shes par bya'o //
translated: Those should be known in the following.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang ba'i'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang ba'i'o //
translated: “The vajra of body, speech, and mind” is the bearer of the vajra.

original: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The “seal” is the great seal endowed with color and so forth.

original: 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni phyag mtshan gyi phyag rgya'am rdul tshon gang la yang rung ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni phyag mtshan gyi phyag rgya'am rdul tshon gang la yang rung ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The word “or” indicates that one should meditate on either the seal of the insignia or the colored powder.

original: 'di dag kyang gong ma dang 'og ma gnyis ka la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag kyang gong ma dang 'og ma gnyis ka la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: These two should be applied to both the higher and lower.

original: tshogs gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis //
analyzed: tshogs gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis //
translated: Endowed with the two collections

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes dang bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo lha mo dang lha phor snang ba'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa yis so//
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes dang bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo lha mo dang lha phor snang ba'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa yis so//
translated: means endowed with the union of the appearance of the goddesses and gods, the essence of the pure collections of exalted wisdom and merit.

original: 'di yang gong ma dang 'og ma gnyis ka la yang sbyar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di yang gong ma dang 'og ma gnyis ka la yang sbyar shes par bya'o //
translated: This should also be applied to both the higher and lower.

original: 'dir ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa gnyis nye bar 'gyur pa dang ldan pa ni rdo rje 'chang rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku mdog dang mi bskyod pa'i phyag mtshan dang ldan pa'o zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa gnyis nye bar 'gyur pa dang ldan pa ni rdo rje 'chang rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku mdog dang mi bskyod pa'i phyag mtshan dang ldan pa'o zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is to be understood.

original: de gnyis kyis na 'di'i 'og nas 'di'i sku mdog la sogs pa mi ston to //
analyzed: de gnyis kyis na 'di'i 'og nas 'di'i sku mdog la sogs pa mi ston to //
translated: Therefore, below, his body color and so forth are not taught.

original: aindra n'i la'i kha dog 'dra //
analyzed: aindra n'i la'i kha dog 'dra //
translated: The color of sapphire

original: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i sku dang rtsa ba'i zhal ni sngon por bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i sku dang rtsa ba'i zhal ni sngon por bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means that the body and the main face of Akshobhya should be meditated as blue.

original: shel dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku mdog la sogs pa ston pa yin no //
analyzed: shel dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku mdog la sogs pa ston pa yin no //
translated: The words crystal and so forth teach the body color and so forth of Vairocana.🔽The word matted locks

original: thor tshugs / @176a * //
analyzed: thor tshugs / @176a * //
translated: means that he has matted locks on his head.

original: cod pan gyis brgyan pa //
analyzed: cod pan gyis brgyan pa //
translated: Adorned with a crown

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: means that all of them are to be applied.

original: ral pa cod pan mdzes dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad smos pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ral pa cod pan mdzes dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad smos pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is as if all of the words beautiful topknot and so forth are mentioned.

original: 'dzam bu chu bo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rin chen dpal gyi sku mdog la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dzam bu chu bo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rin chen dpal gyi sku mdog la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The Jambu river and so on state the color and so forth of Ratnaprabha.

original: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba ni bri ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su 'brang bas rin po che margad nyid gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba ni bri ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su 'brang bas rin po che margad nyid gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The great vajra is the emerald jewel, which should be taken in accordance with the drawn mandala.

original: de nyid kyis na margad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na margad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: For that very reason, it is said emerald and so on.

original: padma r'a ga zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: padma r'a ga zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The padmaraga and so on state the color and so forth of Amitabha.

original: 'od zer sna lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'od zer sna lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The five-colored light and so on state the color and so forth of Amoghasiddhi.

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdzogs pa'i lha rnams byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdzogs pa'i lha rnams byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Now, then and so on state the mantra for blessing the perfect deities.

original: chos rnams kyi dbyings ni lus te rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal pa'i stong nyid yin la /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi dbyings ni lus te rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal pa'i stong nyid yin la /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the body, which is the emptiness of natural luminosity.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyor ro //🔽de yang / gzung 'dzin la sogs rnam bral bas //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyor ro // de yang / gzung 'dzin la sogs rnam bral bas //
translated: One should connect this with “he entered into the meditative concentration of its essential nature.”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no //🔽da ni / rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no // da ni / rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
translated: And that is stated with “free from the differentiation of grasped and grasper, etc.”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems nye bar g-yeng ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems nye bar g-yeng ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Now, in order to pacify the distraction of the mind, he teaches the cultivation of the subtle yoga with “a jewel of five colors, etc.”

original: rin chen zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i rin po che'o //
analyzed: rin chen zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i rin po che'o //
translated: “Jewel” is the jewel of one’s deity’s sign.

original: sna'i rtse mo zhes bya ba ni lha mo'i gsang ba'i chu skyes kyi sna rtse'o //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mo zhes bya ba ni lha mo'i gsang ba'i chu skyes kyi sna rtse'o //
translated: “At the tip of the nose” is at the tip of the secret lotus of the goddess.

original: rtag par zhes bya ba ni ci srid sems rtse gcig par gyur gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: rtag par zhes bya ba ni ci srid sems rtse gcig par gyur gyi bar du'o //
translated: “Always” is as long as the mind becomes one-pointed.

original: brtan par shes nas zhes bya ba ni brtan pa'i mtshan ma shes nas legs par rin po che'i mtshan ma spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: brtan par shes nas zhes bya ba ni brtan pa'i mtshan ma shes nas legs par rin po che'i mtshan ma spro bar bya'o //
translated: “Having known stability” is having known the sign of stability, one should well expand the jewel sign.

original: spro ba'i mtshan ma bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas 'bar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te sangs rgyas kyi sprin spro bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spro ba'i mtshan ma bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas 'bar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te sangs rgyas kyi sprin spro bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In order to demonstrate the signs of delight, he says, “the blazing buddhas,” and so on. The meaning is that one should emit the cloud of buddhas.

original: rin po che'i mtshan ma 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi mtshan ma gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang spro bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rin po che'i mtshan ma 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi mtshan ma gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang spro bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to demonstrate that one should emit other and other signs, he says,

original: 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te ral gri 'dzin pa'i phyag mtshan ni ral gri'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te ral gri 'dzin pa'i phyag mtshan ni ral gri'o //
translated: “discus, vajra,” and so on. The sign of holding a sword is a sword.

original: spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis zhes bya ba ni de dag dbyer mi phyed pa'i blo yod pas so //
analyzed: spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis zhes bya ba ni de dag dbyer mi phyed pa'i blo yod pas so //
translated: “With the nature of emission” means that one has the cognition of their inseparability.

original: yang na sngar gyi phyag mtshan thams cad kyang mchog tu gyur pa yin pas na rin po che zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yang na sngar gyi phyag mtshan thams cad kyang mchog tu gyur pa yin pas na rin po che zhes bya ba la /
translated: Or else, since all the previous signs are supreme, they are called “jewels.”

original: de @176b las kyang brtan par byas nas mtshan ma lnga po nyid spro bar bya'o zhes bshad pa'i phyir 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de @176b las kyang brtan par byas nas mtshan ma lnga po nyid spro bar bya'o zhes bshad pa'i phyir 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, he says “wheel, vajra,” etc.

original: 'dir yang mdzod 'dzin ni rin po che'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang mdzod 'dzin ni rin po che'o //
translated: Here, the “holder of the treasure” is the jewel.

original: mtshon cha ni ral gri'o //
analyzed: mtshon cha ni ral gri'o //
translated: The “weapon” is the sword.

original: don 'dis ni /
analyzed: don 'dis ni /
translated: By this meaning,

original: yang na rang gi mtshan ma phra mo ni //
analyzed: yang na rang gi mtshan ma phra mo ni //
translated: “Or the subtle sign of oneself,”

original: zhes pa la sogs tshigs bcad gnyis smos pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs tshigs bcad gnyis smos pa yin no //
translated: and so forth, are the two verses.

original: da ni nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa la sogs pas sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdan gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa la sogs pas sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdan gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Now, beginning with “in the realm of space,” he speaks of the seat of the Buddhas.

original: chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus na gnas pa'o //
translated: It is located in the middle of the mansion contained within the source of phenomena.

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The “vajra maṇḍala” is the maṇḍala of Akṣobhya.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bri bar bya'o //
translated: It should be drawn on the maṇḍala of the sun.

original: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The “clear maṇḍala” is the maṇḍala of the moon.

original: de'i dbus su 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i dbus su 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In the middle of that, one should meditate on Vairocana, called the “wheel maṇḍala.”

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Thus,

original: thams cad nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la bsam //
analyzed: thams cad nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la bsam //
translated: one should visualize all of them on sun maṇḍalas.

original: zhes pa'i spyi'i tshig 'di la sngar gyi ;
analyzed: zhes pa'i spyi'i tshig 'di la sngar gyi ;
translated: This general statement is made in the verse

original: shar gyi padma zla ba'i dbus su bsam //
analyzed: shar gyi padma zla ba'i dbus su bsam //
translated: “visualize in the east, in the middle of a lotus and moon,”

original: zhes dgar pa'i tshig tu gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes dgar pa'i tshig tu gsungs pa yin no //
translated: which is a specific statement.

original: padma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni //
analyzed: padma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni //
translated: Like a lotus maṇḍala,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor de nyi ma la gnas par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor de nyi ma la gnas par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on that maṇḍala of Amitābha, abiding in the sun.

original: bzlas pa bsgom pas zhes bya ba ni sngags bzlas pa dang sgom pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //🔽rin chen dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni //
analyzed: bzlas pa bsgom pas zhes bya ba ni sngags bzlas pa dang sgom pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas so // rin chen dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni //
translated: Endowed with mantra recitation and meditation,🔽the yogin should visualize Ratnasaṃbhava,🔽like a jewel maṇḍala, abiding in the sun maṇḍala,

original: zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan te nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par rin po che la brtson pas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan te nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par rin po che la brtson pas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: with effort in the jewel.

original: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba //
translated: Arisen from the maṇḍala of union,

original: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi dang 'brel ba'i sku mdog dang sbyor bas dkyil 'khor rang gi ngo bo'i bdag nyid can ljang gu gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi dang 'brel ba'i sku mdog dang sbyor bas dkyil 'khor rang gi ngo bo'i bdag nyid can ljang gu gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: This is the essence of the mandala, which is green, since it is associated with the four, Akshobhya and so on, and the color of their bodies.

original: gdon mi za ba grub pa yin par bshad la /
analyzed: gdon mi za ba grub pa yin par bshad la /
translated: It is explained to be definitely accomplished.

original: de'i yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag par byung zhing ldan par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag par byung zhing ldan par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: And it is said that it arises from the sun mandala, and is endowed with it.🔽It is said that the questioner is only Vairochana, and that the mandala is clarity itself.

original: dris pa rnam par snang mdzad 'ba' zhig la gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin par gsungs na de mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gdan nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yin par mngon par 'dod do //
analyzed: dris pa rnam par snang mdzad 'ba' zhig la gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin par gsungs na de mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gdan nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yin par mngon par 'dod do //
translated: But it is asserted that the sun mandala is the seat of Akshobhya and so on.

original: ci ltar shes she na de brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ci ltar shes she na de brjod par bya ste /
translated: How is this known? This will be explained.

original: gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan //
analyzed: gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan //
translated: The mandala endowed with clarity and so on

original: zhes gleng gzhi'i le'u las gsungs la /🔽der @177a * //
analyzed: zhes gleng gzhi'i le'u las gsungs la / der @177a * //
translated: is stated in the nidana chapter.

original: sogs pa zhes smos pas ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes smos pas ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin par 'dod do //
translated: And since it is said that it is endowed with clarity and so on, the sun mandala is asserted.

original: 'dir yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdan ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin pas /
analyzed: 'dir yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdan ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin pas /
translated: Here also, since the seat of Vairocana is a moon disk,

original: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i sgras nges pa nyid du gsungs la /
analyzed: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i sgras nges pa nyid du gsungs la /
translated: the term “clear disk” is stated with certainty.

original: don gyis na mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi'i gdan ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin par shes so //
analyzed: don gyis na mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi'i gdan ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin par shes so //
translated: And by implication, the seat of the four, Akṣobhya and so on, is a sun disk.

original: da ni 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis sangs rgyas tha mi dad par gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis sangs rgyas tha mi dad par gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Now, beginning with “these,” he states that these maṇḍalas are not different from the Buddha.

original: dkyil 'khor 'di dag ni sangs rgyas rab mchog gi sku dang gsung dang thugs sgom pa la gcig pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas rab mchog go //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di dag ni sangs rgyas rab mchog gi sku dang gsung dang thugs sgom pa la gcig pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas rab mchog go //
translated: These maṇḍalas are the supreme Buddha, since they are identical with the meditation on the body, speech, and mind of the supreme Buddha.

original: rdo rje las byung ba'i zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa las yang dag par byung ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje las byung ba'i zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa las yang dag par byung ba'o //
translated: “Arisen from the vajra” means arisen from Vajradhara.

original: thams cad 'dzin pa'i tshul ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul yin la tshul nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen ba ste de thob pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad 'dzin pa'i tshul ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul yin la tshul nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen ba ste de thob pa'o //
translated: The method of holding everything is the method of omniscience, and the method itself is omniscience, which is attained.

original: le'u gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: Chapter Three is finished.

original: // / da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas le'u bzhi par bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: // / da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas le'u bzhi par bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Now, from “Then” and so on, he declares the mandala to be drawn in Chapter Four.

original: gzhung 'dis ni ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa'i slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus na gnas pa la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i slob ma rnams kyis 'og nas bshad pa'i bstod pa'i rgyal pos gsol ba
analyzed: gzhung 'dis ni ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa'i slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus na gnas pa la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i slob ma rnams kyis 'og nas bshad pa'i bstod pa'i rgyal pos gsol ba
translated: This text teaches that the master endowed with the three meditative stabilizations, dwelling in the center of the mandala ground, is requested by the disciples, who are yogins and yoginīs of Vairocana and so on, holding the vajra and bell, with the king of praises explained below,

original: btab nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes ston te /
analyzed: btab nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes ston te /
translated: to draw the mandala.

original: 'di tshigs su bcad pa dang pos ni spyi'i gsol ba 'debs pa ston to //
analyzed: 'di tshigs su bcad pa dang pos ni spyi'i gsol ba 'debs pa ston to //
translated: The first verse teaches the general request.

original: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pas ni sku'i dkyil 'khor sprul par gsol ba btab pa yin no //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pas ni sku'i dkyil 'khor sprul par gsol ba btab pa yin no //
translated: The second verse teaches the request to emanate the body mandala.

original: tshigs su bcad pa gsum pas ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor sprul par gsol ba btab pa yin no //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa gsum pas ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor sprul par gsol ba btab pa yin no //
translated: The third verse teaches the request to emanate the speech mandala.

original: tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pas ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul bar gsol ba btab pa yin no //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pas ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul bar gsol ba btab pa yin no //
translated: The fourth verse requests the emanation of the mind mandala.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: de ltar sbyor gnas slob dpon ni //
analyzed: de ltar sbyor gnas slob dpon ni //
translated: the master who is thus joined and stationed

original: sangs rgyas kun bdag gzugs can yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun bdag gzugs can yin //
translated: is the embodiment of all the Buddhas.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa mar me mdzad bzang pa'i zhal snga nas kyis bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa mar me mdzad bzang pa'i zhal snga nas kyis bshad pa yin no //
translated: And so on. This is explained by Dipaṃkara Bhadra.

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis sku'i dkyil 'khor khong du chud par bya'o zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid @177b bshad pa gsungs pa yin te //
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis sku'i dkyil 'khor khong du chud par bya'o zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid @177b bshad pa gsungs pa yin te //
translated: Now, in order to understand that the body mandala is to be comprehended by the method of the mind mandala, he says, “Then, etc.”

original: sems kyi rdo rje rab 'dra ba //
analyzed: sems kyi rdo rje rab 'dra ba //
translated: The mind is just like a vajra

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi gzugs can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi gzugs can no //
translated: means that it has its own form.

original: gang 'di thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin mod kyi /
analyzed: gang 'di thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin mod kyi /
translated: This is indeed the mind mandala.

original: 'on kyang rnam par dag pa gsum dang ldan pas sku la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam par dag pa gsum dang ldan pas sku la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: However, in order to show that it is the nature of the body, etc. because it possesses the three purities, he says the mandala of body, speech, and mind.

original: dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa'i phyir srad bu'i mtshan nyid ston te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa'i phyir srad bu'i mtshan nyid ston te /
translated: In order to lay out the mandala, he teaches the characteristics of the thread.

original: lus ngag sems ni bsgom pa yis //
analyzed: lus ngag sems ni bsgom pa yis //
translated: By cultivating body, speech, and mind,

original: zhes bya ba ni lus la sogs pa ltar bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lus la sogs pa ltar bsgoms pas so //
translated: means by cultivating them as if they were body, etc.

original: sar pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gzhan du yongs su ma spyad pa'o //
analyzed: sar pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gzhan du yongs su ma spyad pa'o //
translated: New means not used in another mandala.

original: legs par bkal zhes bya ba la ni shin tu legs par bsgril ba'o //
analyzed: legs par bkal zhes bya ba la ni shin tu legs par bsgril ba'o //
translated: Well-spun means very well spun.

original: tshad ma zhes bya ba ni chur 'khor lo'i nyis 'gyur la sbom du sgo'i nyi shu'i cha'o //
analyzed: tshad ma zhes bya ba ni chur 'khor lo'i nyis 'gyur la sbom du sgo'i nyi shu'i cha'o //
translated: The measure is twice the diameter of the circle, and one-twentieth of the width of the door.

original: mdzes pa yis zhes bya ba ni mdud pa med pa dang mi lhod pas so //
analyzed: mdzes pa yis zhes bya ba ni mdud pa med pa dang mi lhod pas so //
translated: With beauty means without knots and without looseness.

original: 'di'i don ni dkyil chog las //
analyzed: 'di'i don ni dkyil chog las //
translated: The meaning of this is in the Mandala Ritual:

original: brtag pa la sogs rang gi dngos ;
analyzed: brtag pa la sogs rang gi dngos ;
translated: The investigation, etc. of one’s own thing,

original: / zhes bya ba nas brtsams te //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba nas brtsams te //
translated: and so on.🔽

original: srad bu 'dzin pas dkri bar bya //
analyzed: srad bu 'dzin pas dkri bar bya //
translated: From Having made the area even up to the thread-holder should be wound

original: zhes bya ba'i bar las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar las shes par bya'o //
translated: is to be understood.

original: thig gdab pa'i cho ga yang de nyid las shes par bya'o //🔽khru ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya //
analyzed: thig gdab pa'i cho ga yang de nyid las shes par bya'o // khru ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya //
translated: The rite of laying out the lines is to be understood from that very [source].

original: zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin gyi dkyil 'khor ni tshad nges pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin gyi dkyil 'khor ni tshad nges pa med pa yin te /
translated: The measure is twelve cubits is just an indication, for the maṇḍala has no fixed size.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis ni //
analyzed: sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis ni //
translated: Due to the power of sentient beings' intentions,

original: tshad la sogs pa nges pa med //
analyzed: tshad la sogs pa nges pa med //
translated: there is no fixed size, etc.

original: ces bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ces bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: As it is explained.

original: phyag rgya dgod par bya zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dgod pa la bya'i zhal dang phyag la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya dgod par bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyag rgya dgod par bya zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dgod pa la bya'i zhal dang phyag la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya dgod par bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: As for the mudrā should be placed, it refers to placing the symbolic mudrā, not to placing the mudrā endowed with faces, arms, and so forth.

original: de mthong bas thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams gal te mi shes par 'gyur ba srid pa na ngan 'gror 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de mthong bas thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams gal te mi shes par 'gyur ba srid pa na ngan 'gror 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur //
translated: Because if those who have not studied see that, if they do not understand, it is possible that they will go to a bad rebirth.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: mu stegs rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: mu stegs rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of benefiting the tīrthikas,

original: sangs rgyas btsun mo rab tu sbas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas btsun mo rab tu sbas //
translated: the Buddha concealed the queen.

original: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //🔽de dbus rdo rje bri ba ni //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // de dbus rdo rje bri ba ni //
translated: Thus it is said.🔽In the middle of that, one should draw the vajra.

original: zhes bya ba ni thugs rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thugs rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bri bar bya ste /
translated: In the middle of the maṇḍala of the pure mind, the vajra, one should draw the sun maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor 'di ni thugs gtso bor byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di ni thugs gtso bor byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because this maṇḍala is primarily focused on the mind.

original: de bzhin du sku la sogs pa rnam par dag pa 'khor lo la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan te /🔽de rnams rang @178a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du sku la sogs pa rnam par dag pa 'khor lo la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan te / de rnams rang @178a * //
translated: Similarly, the wheel and so forth, which are the purities of the body and so forth, are the hand implements of Vairocana and so forth.

original: gi gdan la ci lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gi gdan la ci lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Those should be drawn on their respective seats.

original: 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to teach this, it is said the great wheel and so forth.

original: sprin gyi dbus dang 'dra ba'i 'od //
analyzed: sprin gyi dbus dang 'dra ba'i 'od //
translated: The light is like the middle of a cloud.

original: ces bya ba ni dbus su sprin gyi 'od dang 'dra ba ste 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan pas rnam par dag pa la nye bar dgos pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang mtshan ma dang ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo gdon pa ston pas gzugs rdo rje la
analyzed: ces bya ba ni dbus su sprin gyi 'od dang 'dra ba ste 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan pas rnam par dag pa la nye bar dgos pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang mtshan ma dang ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo gdon pa ston pas gzugs rdo rje la
translated: This is the cloud-like light in the center.

original: sogs pa dkyil 'khor pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sogs pa dkyil 'khor pa yin gyi /
translated: Since the teaching of the excellent retinue is the very need for purity, and since the teaching of the essence of the sign and meditative concentration is the mandala of Vajra Form and so forth,

original: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: but not of the King of Passion and so forth, or of the Heart of the Earth and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi rgyu'i tshogs bshad ma thag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rgyu'i tshogs bshad ma thag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the immediately preceding explanation of the collection of causes of those [deities] does not exist.

original: de bas na gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma me long la sogs pa gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma me long la sogs pa gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the sign of Vajra Form and so forth, such as the mirror and so forth, should be drawn in the proper place.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir sems kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir sems kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to teach just that, he says mind and so forth.

original: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa phyag mtshan me long la sogs pa phyag rgya'i gzugs su dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi dang / shar phyogs kyi sgo'i ngos gnyis su gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa phyag mtshan me long la sogs pa phyag rgya'i gzugs su dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi dang / shar phyogs kyi sgo'i ngos gnyis su gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The nature of form, the form-vajra, etc., should be placed in the four directions of the mandala and on both sides of the eastern door in the form of the mirror-like mudra.

original: lus dang ngag sems mchod pa yis //
analyzed: lus dang ngag sems mchod pa yis //
translated: With the offering of body, speech, and mind,

original: zhes bya ba ni sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi yi ge gsum gyis gdon par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi yi ge gsum gyis gdon par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means that one should recite with the three syllables that are the nature of body, etc.

original: don 'di nyid kyis na /
analyzed: don 'di nyid kyis na /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
translated: Thus, having drawn the mandala,

original: zla ba nyi mar gdan byas par //
analyzed: zla ba nyi mar gdan byas par //
translated: on a seat of moon and sun,

original: dbus su ral gri bri bar bya //
analyzed: dbus su ral gri bri bar bya //
translated: one should draw a sword in the middle.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smos pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smos pa yin no //
translated: And so on.

original: da ni sgrub pa gtso bo yin par ston pa ni /🔽bud med rab tu mdangs bzang ba //
analyzed: da ni sgrub pa gtso bo yin par ston pa ni / bud med rab tu mdangs bzang ba //
translated: Now, in order to show that the principal thing is the practice,🔽he says, “a woman of excellent radiance,” etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te de nyid kyis na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te de nyid kyis na /
translated: And so,

original: de nas dam tshig mchog sbyor ba //
analyzed: de nas dam tshig mchog sbyor ba //
translated: then, one should practice the supreme commitment,

original: gzugs dang lo yi yon tan ldan //
analyzed: gzugs dang lo yi yon tan ldan //
translated: endowed with the qualities of form and age.

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: Beginning with “thus”

original: dngos grub kun gyi phyir bya'o //🔽zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos grub kun gyi phyir bya'o // zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bshad pa yin te /
translated: up to “for the sake of all powers.”

original: 'di dag ni bdag gis ma bshad do //
analyzed: 'di dag ni bdag gis ma bshad do //
translated: These are not explained by me.

original: de ltar thugs gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni le'u bcu drug pa las 'di nyid kyi tshul dang rjes su mthun pa nyid du khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar thugs gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni le'u bcu drug pa las 'di nyid kyi tshul dang rjes su mthun pa nyid du khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the maṇḍala of the mind, which is the principal one, should be understood in the sixteenth chapter in accordance with this very method.

original: le'u bzhi ba'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bzhi ba'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the fourth chapter.🔽Chapter V

original: // / le'u lnga pas sgrub pa po'i khyad par gyi spyod pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: // / le'u lnga pas sgrub pa po'i khyad par gyi spyod pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
