original: spyod pa kun gyi kun du spyod pa ste de dang mchog gi chos te /
analyzed: spyod pa kun gyi kun du spyod pa ste de dang mchog gi chos te /
translated: The conduct is the conduct of all, and that is the supreme Dharma.

original: 'di dag ni don du gnyer ba yin pas na don kyang yin @178b pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni don du gnyer ba yin pas na don kyang yin @178b pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Since these are the aims, they are also aims.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i don ni the tshom pa dang bral ba'i don te /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i don ni the tshom pa dang bral ba'i don te /
translated: The aim of nonconceptuality is the aim of being free from doubt.

original: de las byung ba ni gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni gnas pa'o //
translated: Arising from that is the abode.

original: sngar ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rigs te /
analyzed: sngar ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rigs te /
translated: Previously, one was of the family of passion, hatred, or delusion,

original: phyis de rnam par dag par gyur pa yin pa de yang dngos grub sgrub par byed do zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyis de rnam par dag par gyur pa yin pa de yang dngos grub sgrub par byed do zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: but later, having become purified, one accomplishes the powers.

original: theg pa mchog ni bla med pa //
analyzed: theg pa mchog ni bla med pa //
translated: The supreme vehicle is unsurpassed.

original: zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul ni bla na yod pa dang bcas pa yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul ni bla na yod pa dang bcas pa yin la /
translated: The system of the perfections is surpassed,

original: theg pa chen po 'di ni bla na med pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'di ni bla na med pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: but this Great Vehicle is unsurpassed.🔽The inferior castes, etc.🔽, are rejected by the castes, etc.

original: rigs ngan zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rigs la sogs pa'i nges pa bzlog pa yin te //
analyzed: rigs ngan zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rigs la sogs pa'i nges pa bzlog pa yin te //
translated: The words low caste and so on refute the determination of caste and so on.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: For it is said:

original: dngos grub thabs shes las byung na //🔽rigs sogs nges pas ci zhig bya //
analyzed: dngos grub thabs shes las byung na // rigs sogs nges pas ci zhig bya //
translated: The powers arise from the knowledge of the means.

original: zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: What is the use of the determination of the castes, etc.🔽?

original: yang gang zhig 'grub par mi 'gyur zhe na /🔽snying nas slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: yang gang zhig 'grub par mi 'gyur zhe na / snying nas slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, what is not accomplished?🔽He says, “one who has no devotion to the master, etc.🔽”,

original: dngos grub ni slob dpon la rag las pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: dngos grub ni slob dpon la rag las pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: for the powers depend on the master.

original: sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum dag la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum dag la //
translated: I have not explained the verses beginning with:

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bdag gis ma bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bdag gis ma bshad do //
translated: “The mothers of the chief Buddhas” and so on.

original: rnam par mi rtog blo can gyis //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog blo can gyis //
translated: “The wise ones who have non-discriminating awareness”

original: zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum dang / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i mkhas pa'o /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum dang / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i mkhas pa'o /
translated: refers to the wise ones who possess the three kinds of superior meditative concentration and non-dual awareness.

original: rigs ngan la sogs pa khyad par du smos pa ni the tshom med par snang ba 'di lta bu'i bdag nyid can ni de kho na nyid du dgag pa ma yin no zhes ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs ngan la sogs pa khyad par du smos pa ni the tshom med par snang ba 'di lta bu'i bdag nyid can ni de kho na nyid du dgag pa ma yin no zhes ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The special mention of “low-caste” and so on is to show that this kind of self, which is clearly not subject to doubt, is not negated in reality.

original: de nyid kyis na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na /
translated: And so,

original: phyin ci log gi rtog pa las grol bas //
analyzed: phyin ci log gi rtog pa las grol bas //
translated: “freed from false imagination”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam pa dag ces bya ba la sogs pa de dag bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam pa dag ces bya ba la sogs pa de dag bshad pa yin no //
translated: and so on, and the verses beginning with “the aspects of virtue and non-virtue” are explained.

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas cil nga mngon par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa la chags pa'i nyan pa po rnams ngan 'gro bar ma gyur cig snyam du shes bzhin du sgrib pa rnam par sel ba la sogs pa ngo mtshar gyis bslangs pa'i yongs
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas cil nga mngon par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa la chags pa'i nyan pa po rnams ngan 'gro bar ma gyur cig snyam du shes bzhin du sgrib pa rnam par sel ba la sogs pa ngo mtshar gyis bslangs pa'i yongs
translated: Now, from “Then” and so forth, in order to prevent the listeners who are attached to the accomplishment that I desire from going to the lower realms, with the intention “May they not go to the lower realms,” Śvetaketu and so on, who were inspired with wonder,🔽

original: su bzlog pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: su bzlog pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Now, from “Then” and so forth, in order to prevent the listeners who are attached to the accomplishment that I desire from going to the lower realms, with the intention “May they not go to the lower realms,” he says this in order to completely turn them away, inspired with wonder, to Bhadrapāla and so forth.

original: chos nyid dag pa 'di zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: chos nyid dag pa 'di zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: This purity of reality is free from apprehended object and apprehending subject.

original: dag pa zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: dag pa zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa'o //
translated: Purity is stainless.

original: snying po'i chos kyi don gang yin par khyad par can rtogs shing bslabs pa de las yang dag par byung ba'o //🔽da ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de kho na nyid ma shes pas chos @179a * //
analyzed: snying po'i chos kyi don gang yin par khyad par can rtogs shing bslabs pa de las yang dag par byung ba'o // da ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de kho na nyid ma shes pas chos @179a * //
translated: The meaning of the essence of the Dharma is realized and trained in, and that is what arises from it.

original: nyid shin tu rnyed par dka' ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: nyid shin tu rnyed par dka' ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Now, in order to teach that the reality of the bodhisattvas is very difficult to attain due to not knowing thatness,🔽he says, “Then the Bhagavān, in order to teach the reality of the bodhisattvas,” and so forth.

original: 'jigs pa la sogs ston par mdzad pa yin pas na /
analyzed: 'jigs pa la sogs ston par mdzad pa yin pas na /

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says “Then,” and so forth.

original: nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid de de gnyis su med cing /
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid de de gnyis su med cing /
translated: The sameness of space, that is, the nonduality of those two,

original: rdo rje ste mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
analyzed: rdo rje ste mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
translated: is the vajra, that is, the indivisible, gnosis samādhi.

original: dgyes pas khyab pa ni gzengs mtho bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dgyes pas khyab pa ni gzengs mtho bar gyur pa'o //

analyzed: ae ma'o chos ae ma'o chos zhes bya ba ni dga' bas ngam ste /
translated: “Oh Dharma, oh Dharma” is the exclamation of delight.

analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i tshul yin yang sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can du gyur pa ni ngo mtshar yin no //
translated: Although it is the way of nonduality, it is marvelous that it has a variety of forms.

analyzed: chos ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo ste /

analyzed: rnam par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni dus gsum char yang ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: snang ba med ces bya ba ni snang pa la snang bar byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Nonappearance” means that there is no agent of appearance in appearance.

analyzed: dbyings gyur pa zhes bya ba ni skyed pa'i sa bon zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: spyod pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa ste /

analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin du 'dir mngon par 'dod de /

analyzed: de la snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya'o //
translated: He entered into union with it.

original: thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags zhes bya ba la /
translated: The mantra of the consecration of the mind.

original: thugs ka'i zla ba'i gdan dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnga' ba'i thugs rdo rje ste /
analyzed: thugs ka'i zla ba'i gdan dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnga' ba'i thugs rdo rje ste /
translated: The seat of the moon at the heart and the vajra of the mind which is the precious crown are the consecration of the mind.

original: de'i byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽rdul dang bral ba'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes @179b kyi rnam pa'o //

translated: This is the meaning of the mantra of the consecration of the mind.🔽The vajra abode free from dust is the aspect of mirror-like wisdom.

original: mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni nye bar dgod pa so sor rtog pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni nye bar dgod pa so sor rtog pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The vajra of non-dual equality is the aspect of the wisdom of individual discernment.

original: rdo rje gsum po zhes bya ba ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum po zhes bya ba ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa ste /
translated: The three vajras are the mind vajra, etc.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsang ba'o //
translated: That is the secret of the Tathagatas.

original: de nyid ni khams gsum byin gyis rlob par byed pa yin pas na gnas so //
analyzed: de nyid ni khams gsum byin gyis rlob par byed pa yin pas na gnas so //
translated: That itself is the abode, since it is the consecration of the three worlds.

original: gnas kyis zhes bya ba ni sngags kyis te /
analyzed: gnas kyis zhes bya ba ni sngags kyis te /
translated: The abode is the mantra,

original: yi ge h'um la sogs pas rnam par bsgom zhing bskyed par bya ba gang yin pa'o zhes mtshams sbyar ro //
analyzed: yi ge h'um la sogs pas rnam par bsgom zhing bskyed par bya ba gang yin pa'o zhes mtshams sbyar ro //
translated: which is to be visualized and generated by the syllable hum, etc.

original: sngags nyid ni mtshan des mtshan par byas pa ni snying ga na gnas pa'i mtshan ma'i dbus na gnas pa'i zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sngags nyid ni mtshan des mtshan par byas pa ni snying ga na gnas pa'i mtshan ma'i dbus na gnas pa'i zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The mantra itself is characterized by that name, which means that it is characterized by the seed syllable located on the moon in the center of the sign located in the heart.

original: mchog rab 'di yis zhes bya ba ni de ltar bshad pa'i sngags kyis so //
analyzed: mchog rab 'di yis zhes bya ba ni de ltar bshad pa'i sngags kyis so //
translated: By this supreme means, by the mantra as explained.

original: bsgrub pa nyid du bya zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab par bya ste bskyed par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: bsgrub pa nyid du bya zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab par bya ste bskyed par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: One should perform the consecration, which means that one should consecrate, and not generate.

original: yi ge h'um la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams las sngar byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge h'um la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams las sngar byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they arise from the seed syllables such as HŪṂ.

original: de ni 'di ltar dri med rang snying zla ba'i zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /🔽mtshan nyid dag dang bral bar dmigs nas ni //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar dri med rang snying zla ba'i zhes bya ba nas brtsams te / mtshan nyid dag dang bral bar dmigs nas ni //
translated: This is how it is: “one should visualize one’s own stainless heart as a moon disc,

original: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: and then, having visualized the moon disc, one should visualize the seed syllable upon it, and then, having visualized the seed syllable, one should visualize the complete form of the deity, and then, having visualized the complete form of the deity, one should visualize the complete form of the deity endowed with the major and minor marks, and then, having visualized the complete form of the deity endowed with the major and minor marks, one should visualize the complete form of the deity endowed with the major and minor marks as being devoid of intrinsic nature.”

original: ye shes sgron ma ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: ye shes sgron ma ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: The lamp of pristine awareness is the pristine awareness of equality.

original: de nyid rdo rje rin chen 'byung ba lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje rin chen 'byung ba lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: That itself is the vajra, and the samādhi that is like the source of jewels is connected with that.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan nyid ni 'di nyid kyi rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan nyid ni 'di nyid kyi rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is Ratnasaṃbhava himself, because he has the nature of delighting in just this.

original: gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni don yod par grub pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni don yod par grub pa lta bu ste /
translated: The vajra of certainty is like Amoghasiddhi,

original: de nyid ni mchod pa'i dbang du byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni mchod pa'i dbang du byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is the one who is taken as the object of worship.

original: de la 'di ni /
analyzed: de la 'di ni /
translated: Here is how it is:

original: pad nang rang gi sa bon 'od rnams kyis //
analyzed: pad nang rang gi sa bon 'od rnams kyis //
translated: “in the center of a lotus, one’s own seed syllable, and the light rays,

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: Beginning from here,🔽one should view up to:

original: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba'i bar yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba'i bar yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Oṃ, all tathāgatas, I am the nature of the self-adoration svāhā.

original: da ni sku la sogs pa byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa'i bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams yang dag par bskul pa'i 'od zer dang / tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni sku la sogs pa byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa'i bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams yang dag par bskul pa'i 'od zer dang / tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the light rays and verses, etc. of the Sugata hosts who are invoked to consecrate the body, etc., he says, Then, etc.

original: sngags la dmigs pa ni nges par bsam pa'o //
analyzed: sngags la dmigs pa ni nges par bsam pa'o //
translated: The focus on the mantra is the definite contemplation.

original: de'i tshul gyis rnam pa snying po'i sa bon las byung ba'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyi 'od zer rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i tshul gyis rnam pa snying po'i sa bon las byung ba'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyi 'od zer rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By that method, the light rays of the offering goddesses arisen from the essence-seed aspects.

original: gang dang zhes bya ba ni yang @180a * //
analyzed: gang dang zhes bya ba ni yang @180a * //
translated: From where?

original: dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs yang dag par bskul ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni des byin gyis brlabs te yang dag pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs yang dag par bskul ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni des byin gyis brlabs te yang dag pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: The yogi who has the invocation of the Tathagatas with the verses of invocation should be blessed by them and should accomplish the true attainment.

original: de ltar na bye brag gi blo mi bya'o zhes bshad pa ni sems la dmigs pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar na bye brag gi blo mi bya'o zhes bshad pa ni sems la dmigs pa zhes pa ste /
translated: Thus, the statement “one should not have a discriminating mind” is the observation of mind.

original: sems kyi tshor ba'i dmigs pa gang yin pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis nges par bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi tshor ba'i dmigs pa gang yin pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis nges par bsgom pa'o //
translated: The observation of the feeling of mind is the meditation as just explained.

original: de'i tshul ni bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshul ni bdag med pa'o //
translated: The method of that is selflessness.

original: de'i 'og tu ngag dang zhes bya ba ni byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags kyi las kyi rnam pa lta bu'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnam par bsgom zhes bya ba byin gyis brlab par bya zhing bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu ngag dang zhes bya ba ni byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags kyi las kyi rnam pa lta bu'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnam par bsgom zhes bya ba byin gyis brlab par bya zhing bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: After that, “speech” and so forth is the blessing of the mantra action aspect, the body, speech, and mind vajras, which are to be blessed and accomplished.

original: sbyor ba rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni sku la sogs pa'i shes rab kyi yang dag par sbyor ba nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mnyam pa nyid de'i ngo bo nyid 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas so //
analyzed: sbyor ba rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni sku la sogs pa'i shes rab kyi yang dag par sbyor ba nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mnyam pa nyid de'i ngo bo nyid 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas so //
translated: The so-called “threefold yoga” is the union of the body, etc., with the wisdom that is the nature of the equality of space, the abode of beings.

original: de yang gang gi phyir lus la sogs pa dmigs pa na /
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir lus la sogs pa dmigs pa na /
translated: And that is because when the body, etc., are perceived,

original: ngo bo nyid kyis brtags pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis brtags pa dmigs su med do //
translated: the imagined nature is not perceived.

original: de bas na sngags kyi lus sbyor ba la tha dad pa'i rgyur gyur pas /
analyzed: de bas na sngags kyi lus sbyor ba la tha dad pa'i rgyur gyur pas /
translated: Therefore, since the body, etc., are the cause of the differentiation in the practice of mantra,

original: byang chub med cing bsgom pa med //
analyzed: byang chub med cing bsgom pa med //
translated: there is no enlightenment and no meditation.

original: ces bya ba ste de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ste de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is the nature of that, is what is intended.

original: sngags kyis brtags pa zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rnam pas sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyis brtags pa zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rnam pas sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: The so-called “mantra-imagination” is the consecration by mantra with the previously explained method.

original: de la chog pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la chog pa 'di ni /
translated: And this is the procedure:

original: de yi thugs ka'i 'od kyi tshogs rnams dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
analyzed: de yi thugs ka'i 'od kyi tshogs rnams dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
translated: The mass of light from his heart, etc.

original: da ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor kha bskang ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor kha bskang ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to complete the subtle yoga, he declares, “Then, ” and so on.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
translated: Abiding in the middle of the realm of space

original: zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
translated: means that he abides on the seat in the middle of the mansion contained within the knowledge-cakra.

original: sangs rgyas gzugs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs su bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzugs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs su bsgom pa'o //
translated: The form of the Buddha means that one should meditate on the form of Vajradhara.

original: de dang por gyur pas rdo rje 'dzin pa phra mo'i sbyor ba yang dag par brtsam par bya'o //🔽'di nyid kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dang por gyur pas rdo rje 'dzin pa phra mo'i sbyor ba yang dag par brtsam par bya'o // 'di nyid kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Since he is the first, one should commence the practice of the subtle yoga of Vajradhara.

original: sna'i rtse mor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: sna'i rtse mor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: In order to teach just this, he declares, “At the tip of the nose, ” and so on.

original: 'di dag kyang 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag kyang 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: These should also be applied to the following.

original: sangs rgyas sku zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam par bsgoms te zhu bar gyur ba de'i steng du de'i rjes la @180b gnas zhes bya ba mi bskyod pa'i sa bon yi ge h'um rim gyis gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam par bsgoms te zhu bar gyur ba de'i steng du de'i rjes la @180b gnas zhes bya ba mi bskyod pa'i sa bon yi ge h'um rim gyis gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Above him, after that, one should gradually place the seed syllable of Akṣobhya, the syllable hūṃ.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa bon yang 'di bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa bon yang 'di bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: The seed syllable of the vajra holder should be seen in the same way.

original: 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang sa bon dgod pa rang gi ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang sa bon dgod pa rang gi ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the following [verses], the seed syllables should be applied according to their own [respective deities].

original: spyan gyi tshul du sbyor ba la //
analyzed: spyan gyi tshul du sbyor ba la //
translated: The union in the manner of Locanā

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang snang ba'i rig pa dang yang dag par sbyor ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang snang ba'i rig pa dang yang dag par sbyor ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: is meditating on the union with the awareness that is the self-appearance of Vairocana.

original: rdo rje padma rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: rdo rje padma rnam par bsgom //
translated: The vajra lotus is meditated on

original: zhes bya ba 'di yang gong ma dang 'og ma gnyi ga la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di yang gong ma dang 'og ma gnyi ga la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: as well, applying both the above and below.

original: rin chen dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
analyzed: rin chen dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
translated: The “jewel maṇḍala” is [that] of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: dang po'i sbyor zhes bya ba ni bsnyen pa la sogs pa nas rjes su mnyes pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: dang po'i sbyor zhes bya ba ni bsnyen pa la sogs pa nas rjes su mnyes pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar ro //
translated: The first union is from the approach and so forth up to the ultimate delight.

original: 'di dag kyang gong ma dang 'og ma gnyi ga dang sbyar bar bya'o //🔽padma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa gtso bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag kyang gong ma dang 'og ma gnyi ga dang sbyar bar bya'o // padma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa gtso bor gyur pa'o //
translated: These are to be applied to both the higher and lower.🔽The lotus maṇḍala is the principal Amitābha.

original: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i rnal 'byor can gyi'o ;
analyzed: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i rnal 'byor can gyi'o ;
translated: The light maṇḍala is of the yogin who is certain to be successful.

original: / sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi bar spro //
analyzed: / sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi bar spro //
translated: The buddha way is the emanation of peace.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dres pa la sogs pa bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la sa bon yongs su gyur pa las rang gi lha gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dres pa la sogs pa bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la sa bon yongs su gyur pa las rang gi lha gdon par bya'o //
translated: After meditating on the mixture and so forth, one should emanate one's deity from the transformation of the seed.

original: 'khor zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i 'khor lo 'byin pa'i rim pas gdon pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i 'khor lo 'byin pa'i rim pas gdon pa'o //
translated: The retinue is the emanation by the process of emanating the retinue maṇḍala of deities.

original: autpala mthing ga'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bdag po'i lha'i mtshan ma la phra mo'i rnal 'byor bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: autpala mthing ga'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bdag po'i lha'i mtshan ma la phra mo'i rnal 'byor bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: The blue lotus and so forth teach that one should perform the subtle yoga on the sign of the lord deity.

original: 'di yang 'dir snga ma dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di yang 'dir snga ma dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should also be applied to the previous ones here.

original: de nyid kyis na yang /🔽rang gi mtshan ma phra mo ni //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na yang / rang gi mtshan ma phra mo ni //
translated: And for that very reason,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no //
translated: he says, “the subtle sign of one’s own” and so on.

original: zas su bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba'i khyad par med par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: zas su bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba'i khyad par med par ston pa yin no //
translated: “ Excrement and urine as food” and so on teaches the absence of the distinction of pure and impure.

original: go 'phang las byed ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i las byed pa'o //🔽lus dang ngag sems las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: go 'phang las byed ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i las byed pa'o // lus dang ngag sems las 'das pa'o //
translated: “ The state of action” is the action of desire.

original: zhes bya ba ni bems po'i lus la sogs pa rnams par 'das pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bems po'i lus la sogs pa rnams par 'das pa'o //
translated: “ Transcending body, speech, and mind” is transcending the inert body and so on.

original: le'u drug pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u drug pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary to the sixth chapter.

original: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni le'u bdun pa gsungs pa yin te //🔽dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor te de nyid ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni le'u bdun pa gsungs pa yin te // dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor te de nyid ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: Now, the seventh chapter is begun with “Then” and so on.🔽“ The great commitment” is the maṇḍala of Vajradhara, which is reality itself.

original: de'i bdag nyid can gyi sngags spyod pa ste /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can gyi sngags spyod pa ste /
translated: The mantra conduct that has that as its nature is the conduct of the great hero.

original: de nyid ni mchog gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yin te /🔽de ston par byed @181a * //
analyzed: de nyid ni mchog gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yin te / de ston par byed @181a * //
translated: That is the supreme, manifest, complete enlightenment.

original: pa'i le'u gsungs so //🔽'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
analyzed: pa'i le'u gsungs so // 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
translated: The chapter that teaches that has been explained.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsang sngags pa rnams kyis gsang sngags sgrub pa la 'jug par slob pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsang sngags pa rnams kyis gsang sngags sgrub pa la 'jug par slob pa'o //
translated: With “all the enjoyments of desire” and so forth, the author teaches the training in the practice of mantra for those who are mantra practitioners.

original: slong mo za zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni brtul zhugs kyi tshul gyis slong mo dgag pa ston to //
analyzed: slong mo za zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni brtul zhugs kyi tshul gyis slong mo dgag pa ston to //
translated: With “eating alms” and so forth, he teaches the prohibition of alms through the method of vows.

original: yan lag ma nyams zhes bya ba ni bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag ma nyams zhes bya ba ni bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “Without defect” means possessing the branches of the preliminary practice and so forth.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan bsten zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po bsten pa nyid kyis byang chub tu 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan bsten zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po bsten pa nyid kyis byang chub tu 'gyur gyi /
translated: With “relying on the qualities of desire” and so forth, he teaches that one becomes enlightened by relying on the five qualities of desire themselves,

original: sdug bsngal bsten pas ni ma yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: sdug bsngal bsten pas ni ma yin no zhes ston to //
translated: and not by relying on suffering.

original: byang chub nyi ma zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: byang chub nyi ma zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: “The sun of enlightenment” are the Buddhas.

original: rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i dbye bas so /
analyzed: rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i dbye bas so /
translated: The three kinds are distinguished as highest, middling, and lowest.

original: mchod par byed pas zhes bya ba ni tha dad par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: mchod par byed pas zhes bya ba ni tha dad par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: “ Worshipping” means not conceiving them as different.

original: rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa ste spros pa'i tshul gyis bshad na de nyid sgra'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa ste spros pa'i tshul gyis bshad na de nyid sgra'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
translated: “ Jewel source” is Akshobhya. If explained in the manner of elaboration, that is the meaning of the term.

original: 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: “ Source of the Dharma of passion” is Ratnasambhava.

original: don yod rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa //
analyzed: don yod rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa //
translated: “ Holder of the supreme of Amoghasiddhis”

original: zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: is Amitabha.

original: rang gi rigs zhes bya ba ni snga ma yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi rigs zhes bya ba ni snga ma yang shes par bya'o //
translated: “ One’s own lineage” should be understood as the previous ones.

original: mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi brdas ni don yod par grub pa yin te /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi brdas ni don yod par grub pa yin te /
translated: “ Akshobhya” is Amoghasiddhi by the symbol of the Dharma.

original: de ltar na 'di ni rnam par spros pa'i tshul bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar na 'di ni rnam par spros pa'i tshul bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the manner of elaboration,

original: rnam par spros pa med pa'i tshul du rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs pa ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par spros pa med pa'i tshul du rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs pa ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The statement form, sound, and so on is the teaching of Vajrasattva in the manner of non-elaboration.

original: sems zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: sems zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The so-called mind is Vajrasattva.

original: 'di nyid ni sangs rgyas thams cad bzlog pa'i dbye bas rnam par spros pa ni gsang ba'i snying po btus pa'i tshul yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni sangs rgyas thams cad bzlog pa'i dbye bas rnam par spros pa ni gsang ba'i snying po btus pa'i tshul yin no //
translated: This very [Vajrasattva] is the teaching of the method of collecting the essence of the secret by the division of reversing all buddhas.

original: lha nyid du zhes bya ba ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs par ro //🔽rigs kyi tshul du rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: lha nyid du zhes bya ba ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs par ro // rigs kyi tshul du rnam par bsgom //
translated: As for deity, it is Vairocana and so on.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs lnga'i dbye ba bsgom pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs lnga'i dbye ba bsgom pas so //
translated: Meditate in the manner of the families means meditating on the division of the five families such as Vairocana.

original: de la spyod pa'i cho ga 'di ni langs nas //🔽dag pa'i sems dpa' rang gi lha'i //
analyzed: de la spyod pa'i cho ga 'di ni langs nas // dag pa'i sems dpa' rang gi lha'i //
translated: The procedure of engaging in that is as follows: Having arisen, and so on.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis bshad pa yin no //
translated: The three verses beginning with The pure being, one's own deity, explain this.

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor //
translated: The application of recollecting the Buddha is as follows: The buddhas are the vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rjes su dran pa bcu drug ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rjes su dran pa bcu drug ston te /
translated: Thus, he teaches the sixteen recollections.

original: sngar mthong ba'i don la phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas skabs su mtshan @181b ma rnam pa lnga byung nas /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba'i don la phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas skabs su mtshan @181b ma rnam pa lnga byung nas /
translated: The object seen previously, in the stage of subtle yoga, is the five signs.

original: spro ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis phyis dran par bya ba yin pas na rjes su dran pa'o //🔽sangs rgyas te rnam par snang mdzad kyi rjes su dran pa la ni sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: spro ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis phyis dran par bya ba yin pas na rjes su dran pa'o // sangs rgyas te rnam par snang mdzad kyi rjes su dran pa la ni sbyor ba ste /
translated: Since it is to be remembered later by the method of emanation, etc., it is recollection.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can gyis bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can gyis bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In the recollection of Buddha, Vairocana, the application is the meditation with the nature of method and wisdom.

original: chos te 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnam pa rjes su dran pa bsgom pa la ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang bsgom zhing rjes su dran par bya'o //
analyzed: chos te 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnam pa rjes su dran pa bsgom pa la ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang bsgom zhing rjes su dran par bya'o //
translated: In the meditation on the recollection of Dharma, Amitābha, one should meditate on and recollect the body, speech, and mind.

original: rdo rje ste mi bskyod pa rjes su dran pa bsgom pa la ni rigs te /
analyzed: rdo rje ste mi bskyod pa rjes su dran pa bsgom pa la ni rigs te /
translated: In the meditation on the recollection of Vajra, Akṣobhya, one should meditate on and recollect the family,

original: gcig dang gsum dang lnga la sogs pa rjes su dran pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: gcig dang gsum dang lnga la sogs pa rjes su dran pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: the single, the triple, the five, and so on.

original: khro bo ste gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rjes su dran pa bsgom pa la ni dam tshig ces bya ba 'og nas bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan gyi rjes su dran pa'i yang dag par sbyor ba bsgoms na byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khro bo ste gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rjes su dran pa bsgom pa la ni dam tshig ces bya ba 'og nas bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan gyi rjes su dran pa'i yang dag par sbyor ba bsgoms na byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The pledge in the meditation on the recollection of the wrathful deities such as Yamantaka is the perfect application of the recollection of the other aspects explained below. If one meditates on that, one will attain enlightenment.

original: gal te rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rnyed na phyi rol gyi rig ma'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa ni lo grangs bcu drug ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rnyed na phyi rol gyi rig ma'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa ni lo grangs bcu drug ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: If one finds a consort who has the characteristics of being suitable, the purity of the external knowledge consort is stated in sixteen years old and so forth.

original: byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas gsum gyis //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas gsum gyis //
translated: By the three places of consecration

original: zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlabs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlabs pas so //
translated: means by the consecrations of body, speech, and mind.

original: spyan zhes bya ba ni rang snang ba'i rig pa'o //🔽rdo rje dang padma'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa ni yi ge h'um dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: spyan zhes bya ba ni rang snang ba'i rig pa'o // rdo rje dang padma'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa ni yi ge h'um dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The eye is the self-appearing knowledge.🔽The purity of the vajra and lotus is stated in the syllable hum and so forth.

original: yi ge h'um gis rdo rje padma 'dab ma brgyad par grub pa la brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge h'um gis rdo rje padma 'dab ma brgyad par grub pa la brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that the vajra is formed by the syllable hum and the lotus has eight petals.

original: yi ge aom ni rdo rje'i nor bu'i cha grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge aom ni rdo rje'i nor bu'i cha grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The syllable Oṃ is for the accomplishment of the vajra gem part.

original: yi ge phat ser po ni gnyi ga'i dbab pa nong ba la'o //
analyzed: yi ge phat ser po ni gnyi ga'i dbab pa nong ba la'o //
translated: The yellow syllable Phaṭ is for the descent of both.

original: yi ge a'a ni sna tshogs padma'i lte ba grub pa la sbyar ro //
analyzed: yi ge a'a ni sna tshogs padma'i lte ba grub pa la sbyar ro //
translated: The syllable A is for the accomplishment of the center of the variegated lotus.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu drug tu phye ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu drug tu phye ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the characteristics of the sixteen recollections that were just explained,

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, “Therein,” and so on.

original: sangs rgyas gzugs zhes bya ba ni sna'i rtse mor gnas pa'i mtshan ma'i lte ba'i 'khor lo la bdag po rnam par snang mdzad spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzugs zhes bya ba ni sna'i rtse mor gnas pa'i mtshan ma'i lte ba'i 'khor lo la bdag po rnam par snang mdzad spro bar bya ste /
translated: “The form of the Buddha” means that one should emanate the lord Vairocana on the center of the wheel at the tip of the nose, which is the center of the sign.

original: 'di ni nye bar mtshan pa yin gyi bsdu ba la sogs pa yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni nye bar mtshan pa yin gyi bsdu ba la sogs pa yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: This is the proximate sign; the collected and so forth should also be seen.

original: de bzhin du 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the same for the following.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'am yang na rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'am yang na rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: “Vajrasattva” is Akṣobhya or else Vajrasattva.

original: rang gi khu ba'i thigs pa yis //
analyzed: rang gi khu ba'i thigs pa yis //
translated: With one’s own drop of semen

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems te thigs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i @182a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems te thigs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i @182a * //
translated: This is the thought of enlightenment, which is the essence of the bodhisattva.

original: sangs rgyas dang rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the Buddha and Vajrasattva.

original: dam tshig rjes su dran pa'i rab tu dbye ba ni dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa yin no //
analyzed: dam tshig rjes su dran pa'i rab tu dbye ba ni dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa yin no //
translated: The analysis of the recollection of the commitments is the recollection of the mandala.

original: rang gi khu ba dag dbyung zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: rang gi khu ba dag dbyung zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: One should emit one's own semen, it is applied.

original: de las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: One should emit the mandala that arises from that.

original: dkyil 'khor tshul du bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gzhan zhig tu spro ba'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor tshul du bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gzhan zhig tu spro ba'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: The mandala-like activity is the nature of the emanation into another mandala.

original: phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas //
analyzed: phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas //
translated: One is well-nourished by the five aggregates.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par dag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i phung pos gang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par dag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i phung pos gang ba'o //
translated: This is filled with the pure aggregates of form and so forth.

original: sems rjes su dran pa'i rab tu dbye ba ni sems rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: sems rjes su dran pa'i rab tu dbye ba ni sems rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: The analysis of the recollection of the mind is the recollection of the mind.

original: mkha' dang mtshungs par spyod par 'gyur //
analyzed: mkha' dang mtshungs par spyod par 'gyur //
translated: One will act like the sky.

original: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam par kun du rgyu ba'i ngang tshul lo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam par kun du rgyu ba'i ngang tshul lo //
translated: This is the nature of moving about in the sky, being equal to the sky.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs gcig tu bsdus pa'i rjes su dran pa gsungs pa ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs gcig tu bsdus pa'i rjes su dran pa gsungs pa ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The statement of the recollection of the body, speech, and mind combined together is “there” and so forth.

original: sngags thams cad kyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs te de rnams kyi rjes su dran pa ni bsgom pa'o //🔽sngags kyi rdo rje'i sku gang yin //
analyzed: sngags thams cad kyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs te de rnams kyi rjes su dran pa ni bsgom pa'o // sngags kyi rdo rje'i sku gang yin //
translated: The recollection of the body, speech, and mind, which are the nature of the form of all mantras, is the meditation.🔽The mantra vajra body

original: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje can gyi sku gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje can gyi sku gang yin pa'o //
translated: is the body of the vajra-holder, which has the nature of the mantra.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: gsung zhes bya ba ste byin gyis brlab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: gsung zhes bya ba ste byin gyis brlab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i sngags so //
translated: It is “speech,” the mantra verse of consecration.

original: sku yis rnam pa bsgoms pas zhes bya ba ni rnam par dag pa'i skus rnams par bsgom pa'o //🔽bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sku yis rnam pa bsgoms pas zhes bya ba ni rnam par dag pa'i skus rnams par bsgom pa'o // bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: “Meditated on by the body” means meditated on by the pure body.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “My body will become like that” is supplied.

original: yang dam tshig rjes su dran pa'i dbye ba gsungs pa de ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: yang dam tshig rjes su dran pa'i dbye ba gsungs pa de ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The statement of the divisions of the recollection of the commitments is “there” and so forth.

original: dam tshig ni rang gi so sor snang ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni rang gi so sor snang ba'o //
translated: The pledge is one’s own individual perception.

original: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni //🔽'bar ba'i aom gyis byin rlabs rlung dang ni //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni // 'bar ba'i aom gyis byin rlabs rlung dang ni //
translated: “In accordance with the rite”🔽means that, as explained, one should bless the wind

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i rim gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i rim gyis so //
translated: with the blazing oṃ.

original: gsad na zhes bya ba ni ro gcig par bya'o //
analyzed: gsad na zhes bya ba ni ro gcig par bya'o //
translated: “If one kills” means that one should make [all things] one taste.

original: ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni byis pas brtags pa'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni byis pas brtags pa'i rnam pas so //
translated: “Unborn” means that [one should do so] by way of the conceptualizations of the childish.

original: byang chub med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rang las tha dad bzlog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rang las tha dad bzlog par byed pa yin no //
translated: “There is no enlightenment” and so forth refutes that [mind] is different from itself.🔽That very [mind], which is the sole ultimate state of the pristine consciousness of natural luminosity, is imagined to have the nature of manifest, complete enlightenment and so on, due to the division of turning away from the blindness of ignorance.

original: de nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes gcig pu mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs su ma rig pas ldongs pa las ldog pa'i dbye bas byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i ngo bor brtags pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa chos kyi rigs pa sna tshogs pa bzhin du rab tu shes shing ston pa yin la /
analyzed: de nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes gcig pu mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs su ma rig pas ldongs pa las ldog pa'i dbye bas byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i ngo bor brtags pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa chos kyi rigs pa sna tshogs pa bzhin du rab tu shes shing ston pa yin la /
translated: It is known and taught as the various types of phenomena, such as the dependent and the real.

original: don dam par @182b ni de thams cad dbyer med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: don dam par @182b ni de thams cad dbyer med pa nyid yin no //
translated: ultimately, all of them are non-dual.

original: de nyid kyang shin tu goms pa'i dbang gis gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis gsal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyang shin tu goms pa'i dbang gis gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis gsal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: And that is made clear by the power of thorough familiarization, in a non-dual manner.

original: mtshan ma med ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi mchan ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi mchan ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Signless means that external signs do not exist.

original: rigs rjes su dran pa'i rab tu dbye ba ni zhes dang gi rigs mchod pa rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: rigs rjes su dran pa'i rab tu dbye ba ni zhes dang gi rigs mchod pa rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: The classification of the recollection of the family is the recollection of the worship of the family.

original: tshe 'di nyid la zhes bya ba 'dir ni nyin mtshan gyis sbyor bas zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la zhes bya ba 'dir ni nyin mtshan gyis sbyor bas zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: In this very life - here, one should understand that it is by the connection of day and night.

original: spyi'i dngos grub gzhan rnams ni 'di nyid kyi nang du 'dus so zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: spyi'i dngos grub gzhan rnams ni 'di nyid kyi nang du 'dus so zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to show that the other general powers are included in this very [recollection of the family],

original: sku dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: sku dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, the body, and so on.

original: gang gzhan phra mo zhes bya ba ni rigs pa 'dzin pa dang mi snang pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams so //
analyzed: gang gzhan phra mo zhes bya ba ni rigs pa 'dzin pa dang mi snang pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams so //
translated: The other subtle ones are the powers of holding the lineage, invisibility, and so on.

original: de ltar na rjes su dran pa bcu drug po 'di ni las kyi mchog gi ting nge 'dzin du de dang der spro ba la sogs pa rab tu ston pa nyid kun du bzang po las bshad pa yin no //🔽le'u bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: de ltar na rjes su dran pa bcu drug po 'di ni las kyi mchog gi ting nge 'dzin du de dang der spro ba la sogs pa rab tu ston pa nyid kun du bzang po las bshad pa yin no // le'u bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: Thus, these sixteen recollections are explained in the chapter of Samantabhadra, which teaches the expansion, etc. , of the samādhi of supreme action in each case.🔽This is the commentary on the seventh chapter, having sixteen verses, called “the recollection of the qualities of the master. ”

original: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas brgyad pa dam tshig le'u gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas brgyad pa dam tshig le'u gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Chapter VIII🔽The eighth chapter begins with “Then, the Bhagavān Vajradhara, having entered the samādhi called ‘Vajra of the essence of all the tathāgatas,’ spoke to all the tathāgatas. ”

original: thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa //
analyzed: thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa //
translated: The path of liberation is taught.

original: zhes bya ba la thar ba ni byang chub ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la thar ba ni byang chub ste /
translated: Liberation is enlightenment.

original: de'i lam ni dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'i lam gyi bden pa ste de rab tu ston ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i lam ni dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'i lam gyi bden pa ste de rab tu ston ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The path to that is the truth of the path in the form of the maṇḍala. The meaning is that it is taught.

original: gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la lan gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la lan gsungs pa ni /
translated: Immediately after the request, the reply is stated.

original: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin ;🔽/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin ; / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Then, the king Vajradhara,

original: rdo rje rin chen 'dzin zhes bya ba la rdo rje nyid rin po che ste de 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen 'dzin zhes bya ba la rdo rje nyid rin po che ste de 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Vajra-ratna-dhara. Vajra itself is a jewel. The meaning is that he holds that.

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa //
translated: The vajra is the indivisibility of the three.

original: zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung thugs la mi phyed bas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung thugs la mi phyed bas gnas pa'o //
translated: The vajra is the indivisibility of body, speech, and mind.

original: byol song skye gnas brtag ces bya ba ni bshad pa'i na tshod kyi tshad las lhag pa dang / ma tshang ba 'ang gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byol song skye gnas brtag ces bya ba ni bshad pa'i na tshod kyi tshad las lhag pa dang / ma tshang ba 'ang gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The animal birth is to be understood as exceeding the measure of the explained age, and also as incomplete.

original: bsam gtan gyi gnas su gsungs pa ni sa phyogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi gnas su gsungs pa ni sa phyogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The place of meditation is said to be a pure place, etc.

original: gtsang zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gtsang sbra dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gtsang zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gtsang sbra dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Pure, etc. means endowed with purity.

original: rgyal ba nyid skyes zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad las byung ba'o //🔽de yang ; tsandan bzang po la sogs kyis byugs zhing //
analyzed: rgyal ba nyid skyes zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad las byung ba'o // de yang ; tsandan bzang po la sogs kyis byugs zhing //
translated: The Victorious One is born, i.e. arises from Vairocana.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa yin no //
translated: And that is explained by anointing with good sandalwood, etc.

original: rigs lnga'i tshogs su bya ba gsungs pa ni nu ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rigs lnga'i tshogs su bya ba gsungs pa ni nu ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The performance of the assembly of the five clans is said to be between the breasts, etc.

original: nu ma'i bar zhes bya ba ni snying gar ro //
analyzed: nu ma'i bar zhes bya ba ni snying gar ro //
translated: Between the breasts is at the heart.

original: klad rgyas kyi bar zhes bya ba ni spyi bor ro //🔽rkang ba'i bar zhes bya @183a * //
analyzed: klad rgyas kyi bar zhes bya ba ni spyi bor ro // rkang ba'i bar zhes bya @183a * //
translated: The up to the top of the head is at the crown of the head.

original: ba ni bral gnyis kyi mtshams la sogs par ro //
analyzed: ba ni bral gnyis kyi mtshams la sogs par ro //
translated: The up to the feet is at the juncture of the two legs, and so forth.

original: lte ba dang rked pa dang gsang bar rgyal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon rigs lnga'i dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: lte ba dang rked pa dang gsang bar rgyal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon rigs lnga'i dgod par bya'o //
translated: At the navel, the waist, and the secret place, one should place the seed syllables of the nature of the five families.

original: cho ga shes pas zhes bya ba ni lha mo bskyed pa'i yan lag bzhi la sogs pa'i cho ga shes pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga shes pas zhes bya ba ni lha mo bskyed pa'i yan lag bzhi la sogs pa'i cho ga shes pa'o //
translated: One who knows the rite is one who knows the rite of the four branches of generating the goddess and so forth.

original: de nyid bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa ni /
translated: That is taught:

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In the center of the realm of space,

original: khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus na gnas pa'o //
translated: in the center of the stacked-up house.

original: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni shes rab bo //
translated: The ocean of wisdom is wisdom.

original: de nyid kyi bdag nyid ni ye shes sems ma phyag mtshan gyi lte ba'i zla ba'i dbus su de'i snying gar bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi bdag nyid ni ye shes sems ma phyag mtshan gyi lte ba'i zla ba'i dbus su de'i snying gar bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The nature of that is the wisdom being, the seal of the moon in the center of the hub of the insignia.

original: de ltar so sor bskyed nas bdag dang lhan cig tu bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni zhi ba rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar so sor bskyed nas bdag dang lhan cig tu bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni zhi ba rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Having thus generated them individually, he says, “together with me.”

original: zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The one called “peaceful vajra-holder” is the yogin.

original: 'dod na zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa 'dod na de la brten pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod na zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa 'dod na de la brten pa'o //
translated: “If he wishes” means if the yogin wishes, he relies on her.

original: shes rab de nyid khyad par dang bcas par gsal bar gsungs pa ni rin chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab de nyid khyad par dang bcas par gsal bar gsungs pa ni rin chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: He clearly states the reality of wisdom along with its distinction, saying “jewel,” etc.

original: rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin ji ltar mdzes pa bzhin du mchod rten zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs ma bsgoms la /
analyzed: rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin ji ltar mdzes pa bzhin du mchod rten zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs ma bsgoms la /
translated: Just as a stūpa is beautiful with the nature of the four precious substances, he should visualize a palace.

original: der ye shes kyi rgya mtsho shes bya ba shes rab ma dus gsum gyis sangs gyas kyi gnas su gyur pa de yin par rnam par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: der ye shes kyi rgya mtsho shes bya ba shes rab ma dus gsum gyis sangs gyas kyi gnas su gyur pa de yin par rnam par bsam par bya'o //
translated: In that, he should visualize the “ocean of wisdom,” i.e., the wisdom woman, who is the abode of the buddhas of the three times.

original: de ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar /
translated: This is as follows:

original: de bzhin rang gi ltar 'dra rang snying pos //
analyzed: de bzhin rang gi ltar 'dra rang snying pos //
translated: Likewise, one’s own essence is similar to that.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: This is connected with “jewel,” etc.

original: da ni mchod pa'i cho ga gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni mchod pa'i cho ga gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Now the rite of worship is taught.

original: bdag gis ba sbu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la autpala zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi cha rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ba sbu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la autpala zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi cha rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: With my hairs and so on. Lotus is the five aspects of the method part.

original: padma zhes bya ba ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa shes rab kyi cha rnam pa lnga'o /
analyzed: padma zhes bya ba ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa shes rab kyi cha rnam pa lnga'o /
translated: Lotus is the five aspects of the wisdom part, beginning with Rūpavajrā.

original: de ni 'di ltar gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa lha mo ldas yongs su rgyas par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa lha mo ldas yongs su rgyas par bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus it is explained by the ten goddesses beginning with Rūpavajrā.

original: dz'a ti rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog gi gnas kyi dbye ba'i bdag nyid can chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje'o //
analyzed: dz'a ti rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog gi gnas kyi dbye ba'i bdag nyid can chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje'o //
translated: The three jātis is the nature of the division of the inferior, middling, and superior stages, the vajra of the realm of phenomena.

original: me tog kar ni ka dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i me tog bzhis ni spyan la sogs pa bzhi yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: me tog kar ni ka dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i me tog bzhis ni spyan la sogs pa bzhi yin par 'dod do //
translated: The four flowers beginning with karṇikāra are asserted to be the four beginning with Locanā.

original: de ltar na lha mo bcu po 'di dag gis mchod pa'i sprin kun spro ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu brtag par bya ba'i me tog ji lta ba nyid du ni gzung bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar na lha mo bcu po 'di dag gis mchod pa'i sprin kun spro ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu brtag par bya ba'i me tog ji lta ba nyid du ni gzung bar mi bya ste /
translated: Thus, one should not grasp the flowers, etc. , as they really are, in the manner of imagining the clouds of offerings of these ten goddesses, etc.

original: le'u bco brgyad pa las /
analyzed: le'u bco brgyad pa las /
translated: The eighteenth chapter says:

original: me tog ces ni bgyi zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: me tog ces ni bgyi zhes bya ba la //
translated: The so-called flowers

original: lha mo dgu dang nam @183b mkha'i dbyings //🔽zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lha mo dgu dang nam @183b mkha'i dbyings // zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are the nine goddesses and the realm of space.

original: mchod pa'i khyad par nyid gsungs pa ni dpag tshad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i khyad par nyid gsungs pa ni dpag tshad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The special offerings are mentioned in the line beginning yojanas.

original: mtshan ma yang mchod pa'i don du spro ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni padma rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma yang mchod pa'i don du spro ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni padma rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The signs are to be cultivated in the manner of imagining them as offerings, etc. This is mentioned in the line beginning lotus and vajra.

original: gsang pa'i mchod pa gsungs nas /
analyzed: gsang pa'i mchod pa gsungs nas /
translated: Having mentioned the secret offerings,

original: phyi'i mchod pa yang dbul ba'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: phyi'i mchod pa yang dbul ba'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa ni /
translated: he also mentions the external offerings, the purity of the act of giving:

original: rin chen na bza' la sogs pa //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rin chen na bza' la sogs pa //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: jewels, clothing, and so on.

original: phyi'i yang sems tsam gyis lhag par sprul pas spyin pa'i phyir mchod pa bya'o shes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyi'i yang sems tsam gyis lhag par sprul pas spyin pa'i phyir mchod pa bya'o shes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should make offerings with the mere mind of external and internal offerings, because of the superior emanation of offerings.

original: thabs la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'dod pa'i mchog la spyod pas kyang mchod pa dbul bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni bdag po'i phyag rgyar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'dod pa'i mchog la spyod pas kyang mchod pa dbul bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni bdag po'i phyag rgyar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The one who is skilled in means, the yogi/nī, should make offerings by enjoying the supreme of desires, as stated in the verse beginning with “the lord’s consort.”

original: sangs rgyas la ste rnam par dag pa'i 'dod pa'i blo can rnams la dbang po gnyis reg pa'i yang dag par sbyor ba de dbyer mi phyed par bsgoms pas dbul bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la ste rnam par dag pa'i 'dod pa'i blo can rnams la dbang po gnyis reg pa'i yang dag par sbyor ba de dbyer mi phyed par bsgoms pas dbul bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
translated: One should make offerings to the buddhas, those with pure minds of desire, by meditating on the indivisible union of the two organs.

original: dam tshig lnga pos mchod pa gsungs pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig lnga pos mchod pa gsungs pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The verse beginning with “the realm of space” teaches the offering of the five pledges.

original: chos 'byung ba'i khang ba brtsegs ma'i nang du chud par dkyil 'khor bkod pa ste lta'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid can rnams par snang mdzad yongs su 'gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: chos 'byung ba'i khang ba brtsegs ma'i nang du chud par dkyil 'khor bkod pa ste lta'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid can rnams par snang mdzad yongs su 'gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the mandala of the nature of the hosts of deities, which is contained within the house of the source of phenomena, which is the transformation of Vairocana.

original: de'i dbus su bdag gi lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su bdag gi lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin du'o //
translated: In its center, one’s body is the nature of the Tathāgatas.

original: de nyid kyis na bla ma'i rang bzhin gyi dam tshig rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na bla ma'i rang bzhin gyi dam tshig rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: With that very [body], one should worship with the pledges of the nature of the guru.

original: brtan pa'i blo ldan pas zhes bya ba ni thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi blo dang ldan pa'o //🔽de ltar na 'di dag thams cad ni //🔽padma'i nang gi sa bon 'od rnams kyis //
analyzed: brtan pa'i blo ldan pas zhes bya ba ni thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi blo dang ldan pa'o // de ltar na 'di dag thams cad ni // padma'i nang gi sa bon 'od rnams kyis //
translated: “The one of firm intellect” is the one endowed with the intellect of the sameness of all things.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: Thus, all of this is to be completed with the words “the seed in the lotus, the lights,” and so forth.

original: dam tshig gis yongs su mchod pa dam tshig gi le'u'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gis yongs su mchod pa dam tshig gi le'u'o //
translated: The chapter on the worship with pledges is concluded.

original: le'u brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: The ninth chapter

original: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni le'u dgu pa gsungs te /
analyzed: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni le'u dgu pa gsungs te /
translated: The ninth chapter is stated with “then,” and so forth.

original: sku dang gsung thugs longs spyod pa //
analyzed: sku dang gsung thugs longs spyod pa //
translated: The enjoyment of body, speech, and mind

original: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid du byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid du byas pa'o //
translated: is the self-empowerment.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje gsum pa mi phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje gsum pa mi phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin te /
translated: That itself is the mandala of the indivisible three vajras.

original: de lta bur gyur pa de bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa de bshad pa'o //
translated: That is what is explained.

original: bsam gtan las byung ba'i las kyi tshogs gsungs pa ni nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan las byung ba'i las kyi tshogs gsungs pa ni nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The collection of actions arising from meditative concentration is stated by “space,” etc.

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor @184a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor @184a * //
translated: The mandala of the buddhas

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: is the mandala of Vairocana.

original: de'i dbus su rdo rje mi bskyod pa rab tu bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de'i dbus su rdo rje mi bskyod pa rab tu bsgoms nas /
translated: Having meditated on Akṣobhya in the center of that,

original: de'i lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on the vajra in his hand.

original: de ltar ci rigs par lha bcu dgu dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo bsams la bsgrub par bya ba dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa /
analyzed: de ltar ci rigs par lha bcu dgu dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo bsams la bsgrub par bya ba dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa /
translated: Having thus visualized the wheel endowed with the nineteen deities, one should look at the one to be accomplished, who is harming the Three Jewels,

original: dmyal ba la sogs par mngon par phyogs pa la bltas te /
analyzed: dmyal ba la sogs par mngon par phyogs pa la bltas te /
translated: and who is facing the hells, etc.

original: de las gdon par 'dod pa'i snying rje chen pos non pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis bcos par mi nus pa rnams la /
analyzed: de las gdon par 'dod pa'i snying rje chen pos non pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis bcos par mi nus pa rnams la /
translated: The yogi who is overwhelmed by the great compassion that wishes to rescue them from that cannot help them with the four means of gathering others to oneself.🔽

original: kha sbyar dbye ba la sogs pa'i cho gas rdo rjes phye mar brlag par bya'o zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: kha sbyar dbye ba la sogs pa'i cho gas rdo rjes phye mar brlag par bya'o zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: The yogi who is overcome by great compassion, which desires to rescue from that, should pulverize with the vajra the ones who cannot be converted by the four means of gathering [disciples], through the rite of separating the union and so forth.🔽One should understand that.

original: bde ba'i khyad par la chags pas mtho ris kyi don du phyugs kyi mchod sbyin phyed pa la sogs pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bde ba'i khyad par la chags pas mtho ris kyi don du phyugs kyi mchod sbyin phyed pa la sogs pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not like the animal sacrifice and so forth for the sake of heaven, out of attachment to the special bliss.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag tu yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag tu yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand it in the same way in other [contexts].

original: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni gdug pa rnams te de bsad pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni gdug pa rnams te de bsad pa'o //
translated: All sentient beings are the wicked, and they are killed.

original: de yang rnal 'byor ba 'di lta bu ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pas de lta bu khyad par du 'phags pa'i sngags kyi sbyor ba'i sgrub pas gsad pa'i mthus mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang rnal 'byor ba 'di lta bu ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pas de lta bu khyad par du 'phags pa'i sngags kyi sbyor ba'i sgrub pas gsad pa'i mthus mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, this kind of yogi, due to possessing great compassion, by the power of killing through the practice of such a special mantra, will be born as a son of the Victor in the Akshobhya Buddhafield.

original: bsod nams de'i stobs kyis rnal 'byor pa de yang de bzhin du rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsod nams de'i stobs kyis rnal 'byor pa de yang de bzhin du rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By the power of that merit, that yogin is born as a son of the Victor.

original: de ltar na 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, this should be known as the reality of the commitment of the family of hatred.

original: rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni gti mug la sogs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa la yang cho ga 'di lta bur dam tshig 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni gti mug la sogs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa la yang cho ga 'di lta bur dam tshig 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The “ocean of all families” means that for a yogin of the family of delusion and so forth, there is no contradiction in the commitments in this rite.

original: ser snas bsgrubs pa'i yi dags la sogs pa'i 'gro ba dgag par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ser snas bsgrubs pa'i yi dags la sogs pa'i 'gro ba dgag par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to prevent the attainment of the hungry ghost and other destinies that are produced by miserliness,

original: ma byin par len pa rnam par dag par gsungs pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma byin par len pa rnam par dag par gsungs pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: the purification of stealing is taught by “Then, the Bhagavān” and so forth.

original: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
translated: The “wheel maṇḍala” is that of Vairocana.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams rnam par bsgom par bya ba ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams rnam par bsgom par bya ba ste /
translated: “All buddhas” are the deities of the maṇḍala that are to be visualized.

original: 'di dag kyang thams cad du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag kyang thams cad du shes par bya'o //
translated: These should be understood in all cases.

original: rin chen kun gyi zhes bya ba ni rdzas rnams kyi ste /
analyzed: rin chen kun gyi zhes bya ba ni rdzas rnams kyi ste /
translated: All jewels means all substances.

original: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ni rgyus so //
analyzed: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ni rgyus so //
translated: By means of yoga means by means of the cause.

original: rdo rje'i gzugs ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs te rab tu brtag pa ni de'i ngo bo nyid du ser sna can thams cad do //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gzugs ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs te rab tu brtag pa ni de'i ngo bo nyid du ser sna can thams cad do //
translated: The vajra form is the form of the Buddha. Imagining means all the miserly people.

original: de las nor rnams @184b thams cad sku la sogs pa'i rdo rjes dbrog par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de las nor rnams @184b thams cad sku la sogs pa'i rdo rjes dbrog par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: From that, all wealth should be imagined to be taken away by the vajra body, etc.

original: de las nor rnams thams cad phrogs nas kyang /
analyzed: de las nor rnams thams cad phrogs nas kyang /
translated: Having taken away all wealth from that,

original: yang de nor dang ldan zhing yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar sbyin pa por 'gyur zhing rnal 'byor pa rnams la yang 'di lta bu'i bsod nams kyi tshogs skye bar 'gyur te bsam pa yongs su dag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang de nor dang ldan zhing yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar sbyin pa por 'gyur zhing rnal 'byor pa rnams la yang 'di lta bu'i bsod nams kyi tshogs skye bar 'gyur te bsam pa yongs su dag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: again he becomes a donor endowed with wealth, like a wish-fulfilling gem, and for the yogins, this kind of accumulation of merit arises, because of the complete purity of intention.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: byang chub sems dpa'i kun rtog las //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i kun rtog las //
translated: From the conception of the bodhisattva,

original: dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba //
analyzed: dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba //
translated: whether virtuous or nonvirtuous,

original: thams cad dge ba nyid 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad dge ba nyid 'gyur te /
translated: everything becomes virtuous.

original: gang phyir de yis dbang gyur yin //🔽zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: gang phyir de yis dbang gyur yin // zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: because they are under its control.

original: gti mug la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams la yang dgag pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: gti mug la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams la yang dgag pa med pa yin no //
translated: This reality of the commitments of delusion and so forth is not prohibited for the yogins of the family of anger.

original: phrag dog can gyi skyes bu rnams rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phrag dog can gyi skyes bu rnams rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir /
