translated: In order to prevent the fault of harm in a place where obstacles have been removed, the procedure for the ritual dagger is stated: Vajra Amṛta, and so forth.

original: bdud rtsi thab sbyor nyid du sku stod thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid la sku smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje phur bu byas la /
analyzed: bdud rtsi thab sbyor nyid du sku stod thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid la sku smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje phur bu byas la /
translated: Having made the upper part of the body the nature of method and wisdom, the lower part of the body is made into a vajra ritual dagger with the form of a single-pointed vajra.

original: phur bu la gdab pa'i sngags kyis phyogs bcur spros nas gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phur bu la gdab pa'i sngags kyis phyogs bcur spros nas gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should emanate it into the ten directions with the mantra for striking the dagger.

original: de yang / sku stod bgegs rgyal sku smad rtse //
analyzed: de yang / sku stod bgegs rgyal sku smad rtse //
translated: And also: The upper body is the king of obstacles, the lower body is the point.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no ;
translated: This is stated in the Tantra of the Wheel of Time, and so forth.🔽The divisions of pacifying activity are stated in the lines beginning with “beautiful radiance,” and so forth.

original: / zhi ba'i las kyi dbye ba gsungs pa ni mdangs bzang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste zla ba la gnas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo rdo rje can aom a'a: dzi na dzi ka che ge mo sh'inta ku ru h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags
analyzed: / zhi ba'i las kyi dbye ba gsungs pa ni mdangs bzang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste zla ba la gnas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo rdo rje can aom a'a: dzi na dzi ka che ge mo sh'inta ku ru h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags
translated: Visualize Vairocana residing on a moon disc, together with the goddess Vajrī, reciting the mantra Oṃ āḥ jinajik🔽.

original: zlos pa'am gdon pa'i sngags la gnas pa'am /
analyzed: zlos pa'am gdon pa'i sngags la gnas pa'am /
translated: Alternatively, visualize the mantra syllables residing on a moon disc,

original: rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge gcig tu zlos par bsams la /
analyzed: rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge gcig tu zlos par bsams la /
translated: and imagine that they are the single syllable of your own seed.

original: de'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying ga'i zla bar zhi ba'i don du gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying ga'i zla bar zhi ba'i don du gzhag par bya'o //
translated: For the purpose of pacifying, place this on the moon disc at the heart of the gnosis being.

original: spyan gyi rnam par spros pa rnams aom ru ru spu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ne sarba rtha s'a dha ni che ge mo'i sh'inti ku ru sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags zlos pa rnams kyis sam /
analyzed: spyan gyi rnam par spros pa rnams aom ru ru spu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ne sarba rtha s'a dha ni che ge mo'i sh'inti ku ru sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags zlos pa rnams kyis sam /
translated: Visualize the emanation of eyes reciting the mantra Oṃ ruru sphuru jvala tiṣṭha siddha locane sarva artha sādhani🔽.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang ldan zhing yi ge gsum dang spel ba'i 'byin pa'i sngags sam /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang ldan zhing yi ge gsum dang spel ba'i 'byin pa'i sngags sam /
translated: Endowed with the name of the one to be accomplished, and combined with the three syllables, the mantra of emission,

original: rang gi sa bon zlos pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i khams gang ba bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi sa bon zlos pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i khams gang ba bsam par bya'o //
translated: or the recitation of one's own seed syllable, one should imagine filling the realm of space.

original: de bzhin du 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should apply the following in the same way, as appropriate.

original: de nas de rnams yang dag par bsdus nas spyan la sogs pa bdud rtsir gyur pa'i 'od zer gyi gong bu'i gzugs kyis nang gi yan lag tshim zhing rgyas par bya ba'i phyir dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de rnams yang dag par bsdus nas spyan la sogs pa bdud rtsir gyur pa'i 'od zer gyi gong bu'i gzugs kyis nang gi yan lag tshim zhing rgyas par bya ba'i phyir dbab par bya'o //
translated: Then, having gathered them together, one should cause them to descend in the form of a mass of light rays of nectar, such as the eyes, in order to satisfy and expand the inner limbs.

original: ba spu'i bu ga rnams las kyang sangs rgyas kyi sprin de rnams nyid kyis bdag nyid bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams te /
analyzed: ba spu'i bu ga rnams las kyang sangs rgyas kyi sprin de rnams nyid kyis bdag nyid bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams te /
translated: From the pores of the body, those very clouds of buddhas, holding vases of nectar,

original: nang pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur bde la stsol to //
analyzed: nang pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur bde la stsol to //
translated: bestow the consecration in order to pacify the faults of the inner [body].

original: rgyas par gsungs pa ni nam mkha'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang na gnas ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa nyi ma'i gdan can 'od dpag tu med pa ser po bsams la /
analyzed: rgyas par gsungs pa ni nam mkha'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang na gnas ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa nyi ma'i gdan can 'od dpag tu med pa ser po bsams la /
translated: The extensive explanation is the one called “Vajra of Space,” and so on. One should imagine a yellow Amitābha, who is seated on a sun seat in the maṇḍala of great wind in the interior of the kūṭāgāra.

original: aom a'a: a'a ro li ka che ge mo'i pushtim ku ru h'um zhes bya ba'i @198b sngags zlos pa'i lha'i 'khor lo dang ldan ba bsams la ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i zla ba la rgyas pa don du gnyer ba gzhag par bya'o //🔽gos dkar mo la sogs pa spros pa /
analyzed: aom a'a: a'a ro li ka che ge mo'i pushtim ku ru h'um zhes bya ba'i @198b sngags zlos pa'i lha'i 'khor lo dang ldan ba bsams la ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i zla ba la rgyas pa don du gnyer ba gzhag par bya'o // gos dkar mo la sogs pa spros pa /
translated: One should imagine the divine wheel endowed with the recitation of the mantra “Oṃ āḥ ārolikā such-and-such’s puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ,” and one should place the one who seeks prosperity on the moon in the heart of the gnosis being.

original: aom aa ka te bi ka te ni ka te ka tam ka te che ge mo'i pushim ku ru aom zhes bya pa'i sngags zlos pa dang mngon par 'dod pa'i nor gyi char 'bebs pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom aa ka te bi ka te ni ka te ka tam ka te che ge mo'i pushim ku ru aom zhes bya pa'i sngags zlos pa dang mngon par 'dod pa'i nor gyi char 'bebs pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that the space element is filled with emanations of Pāṇḍaravāsinī, and so on, who are reciting the mantra “Oṃ akate vikate nakate kṣataṃkate such-and-such’s puṣṭiṃ kuru oṃ,” and who are causing a rain of desired wealth to fall.

original: de nas de yang dag par bsdus la snga ma bzhin du 'od zer gyi gong bus mngon par 'dod pa'i nor gyi char 'bebs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas la dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de yang dag par bsdus la snga ma bzhin du 'od zer gyi gong bus mngon par 'dod pa'i nor gyi char 'bebs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas la dbab par bya'o //
translated: Then, having gathered that together, one should cause it to rain down upon the body, speech, and mind of the one to be accomplished, in the form of a ball of light rays, as before, with a rain of wealth as desired.

original: ba spu'i bu ga rnams kyang rin po che'i sprin can gyi 'od dpag tu med pa spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: ba spu'i bu ga rnams kyang rin po che'i sprin can gyi 'od dpag tu med pa spro bar bya'o //
translated: And one should emit immeasurable light rays in the form of clouds of jewels from the pores of the body.

original: de nas sangs rgyas par 'dod pa de nyid la dbang bskur ba rab tu stsol to zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du thams cad sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas par 'dod pa de nyid la dbang bskur ba rab tu stsol to zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du thams cad sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should confer the consecration upon that one who is to be consecrated as a Buddha, as before, up to the application of everything.

original: dbang du bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dbang du bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The procedure for enthralling is stated: In the realm of space, etc.

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zla gam bsam //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zla gam bsam //
translated: One should imagine a vajra half-moon maṇḍala.

original: zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin gyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin gyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
translated: This is a moon maṇḍala, not a half-moon shaped wind maṇḍala.

original: de bas na khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus su rdo rje nam mkha'i mchog ces bya ba don yod grub pa dmar po'i mdog can sngags ji lta ba bzhin du zlos pa mdzes par bsams la /
analyzed: de bas na khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus su rdo rje nam mkha'i mchog ces bya ba don yod grub pa dmar po'i mdog can sngags ji lta ba bzhin du zlos pa mdzes par bsams la /
translated: Therefore, in the center of the Cakeshvara Palace, one should imagine the red Amoghasiddhi called Vajra Space, reciting the mantra as before.

original: snga ma bzhin du thams cad rjes su dpags te las rnams bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du thams cad rjes su dpags te las rnams bya'o //
translated: One should infer everything as before and perform the rites.

original: sngar spyad pa'i mngon spyod dang rjes su 'brel pa'i las gsungs pa ni nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sngar spyad pa'i mngon spyod dang rjes su 'brel pa'i las gsungs pa ni nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The rite connected with the previously explained rite of violence is stated by “the sky vajra,” etc.

original: me'i dkyil 'khor ni gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil can te /
analyzed: me'i dkyil 'khor ni gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil can te /
translated: The fire maṇḍala has a triangular blazing center.

original: der gnas pa'i dgra bo la srin po la sogs pas rnam par gtses par gyur par bsams la khros pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor pas cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du spel ba'i sngags bzla bar bya zhing /
analyzed: der gnas pa'i dgra bo la srin po la sogs pas rnam par gtses par gyur par bsams la khros pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor pas cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du spel ba'i sngags bzla bar bya zhing /
translated: One should imagine that the enemy who resides there is tormented by rākṣasas, etc., and the wrathful deity yoga reciter should recite the mantra as before, as it is spread.

original: m'a ma k'i dang shes rab mthar byed la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba dang / spel ba'i rang rang gi dbyug pa'i sngags zlos shing /
analyzed: m'a ma k'i dang shes rab mthar byed la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba dang / spel ba'i rang rang gi dbyug pa'i sngags zlos shing /
translated: One should recite the mantra of the individual club of the one to be spread, such as Māmakī, Prajñāntaka, etc.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam pa gzhig par brtson pa la spro ba la sogs pa'i tshul du ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas bsgom zhing mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam pa gzhig par brtson pa la spro ba la sogs pa'i tshul du ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas bsgom zhing mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should meditate in the manner of enthusiasm, etc. for the destruction of the aspect of the object of attainment, and one should accomplish the desired goal by the rite as explained.

original: 'di dag kyang gsal bar ma bshad do //
analyzed: 'di dag kyang gsal bar ma bshad do //
translated: These are not clearly explained.

original: da ni rnam par snang mdzad la @199a * //
analyzed: da ni rnam par snang mdzad la @199a * //
translated: Now, in order to recall the explanation of Vairochana, etc.

original: sogs pa'i gzhal la sogs pa bshad pa dran par bya ba'i phyir dang / ma bshad pa rnams bshad par bya ba'i phyir dang / rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sogs pa'i gzhal la sogs pa bshad pa dran par bya ba'i phyir dang / ma bshad pa rnams bshad par bya ba'i phyir dang / rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and the celestial mansion, etc., in order to explain what was not explained, and in order to explain the three-faced Vairochana, etc., it is said:

original: 'dir yang sangs rgyas gsum po nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid gtso bo nyid yin par bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'dir yang sangs rgyas gsum po nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid gtso bo nyid yin par bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin la /
translated: Here, too, the three Buddhas themselves are stated in order to teach that the body, speech, and mind are the principal ones.

original: mngon par rtogs pa la dgos pa'i khro bo rnams kyang bsam gtan dang bri ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la srung ba'i phyir dgos pa dang / drag shul gyi las la sogs pa las kyi dbang du byas nas 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa gsungs pa ni ta ka ki'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa la dgos pa'i khro bo rnams kyang bsam gtan dang bri ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la srung ba'i phyir dgos pa dang / drag shul gyi las la sogs pa las kyi dbang du byas nas 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa gsungs pa ni ta ka ki'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The desire kings such as the king of the takakas are taught in terms of the power of karma such as the wrathful action.

original: phyag bzhi zhes bya ba ni shes rab dam pa 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyag bzhi zhes bya ba ni shes rab dam pa 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: The four-armed one is the one who is not included in the two arms that embrace the excellent wisdom.

original: 'di rnams kyi zhal dbus ma dang sku ni nag po'i zhal g-yas pa ni dkar bo'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi zhal dbus ma dang sku ni nag po'i zhal g-yas pa ni dkar bo'o //
translated: The central face and body of these are black, the right face is white,

original: g-yon pa ni dmar po'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa ni dmar po'o //
translated: and the left face is red.

original: gtsug tor gyis ni sku dang dbus ma'i zhal ni ser po yin la g-yas pa ni nag po'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor gyis ni sku dang dbus ma'i zhal ni ser po yin la g-yas pa ni nag po'o //
translated: The central face and body of the uṣṇīṣa are yellow, the right face is black,

original: g-yon pa ni dkar po ste khyad par ni de yod do //
analyzed: g-yon pa ni dkar po ste khyad par ni de yod do //
translated: and the left face is white. This is the difference.

original: yi ge gcig ces bya ba ni gtsug tor bdun char yang sa bon gcig pu nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge gcig ces bya ba ni gtsug tor bdun char yang sa bon gcig pu nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The one syllable means that all seven uṣṇīṣas have the same seed.

original: las kyi tshogs kyi dbang du byas pa'i khro bo gsungs pa ni gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: las kyi tshogs kyi dbang du byas pa'i khro bo gsungs pa ni gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The wrathful ones taught in terms of the aggregate of rites are the one called “Mass of Splendor,” and so forth.

original: 'di rnams ni zhes bya ba ni las kyi tshogs dang rjes su mthun pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: 'di rnams ni zhes bya ba ni las kyi tshogs dang rjes su mthun pa rnams kyis so //
translated: “ These” are those who are in accord with the aggregate of rites.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon du gyur pas lhag par grub par bstan pa'i phyir don de nyid bzlas te bstan pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon du gyur pas lhag par grub par bstan pa'i phyir don de nyid bzlas te bstan pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: In order to teach the special achievement by the actual Vajradhara, the same point is repeated: “In the realm of space,” and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas gzugs ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ste de rab tu bsgoms la de yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad cho ga bzhin du rnam par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzugs ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ste de rab tu bsgoms la de yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad cho ga bzhin du rnam par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “ The form of the Buddha” is the Great Vajradhara; having meditated on that, having transformed it, one should meditate on Vairochana according to the rite.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sngar rdo rje sems dpar gyur pas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'am /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sngar rdo rje sems dpar gyur pas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'am /
translated: “ Vajrasattva” is the one who previously became Vajrasattva, Vajrasattva himself dwelling on the moon disc.

original: mi bskyod pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa bsam par bya ste /
translated: One should imagine Akṣobhya seated on a sun mandala.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgras gnyis ka la yang bshad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgras gnyis ka la yang bshad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the term “vajrasattva” is explained as referring to both.

original: sangs rgyas gsum po bshad nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas gsum po bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the three buddhas,

original: spyan la sogs pa gsungs pa ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: spyan la sogs pa gsungs pa ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: the statement of Locanā, etc., is “the vajra maṇḍala, etc.”

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'od @199b mchog can //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'od @199b mchog can //
translated: The vajra maṇḍala, supreme light

original: zhes bya ba ni thugs rnam par dag pa'i m'a ma k'i'i dkyil 'khor te rigs kyi bdag po rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thugs rnam par dag pa'i m'a ma k'i'i dkyil 'khor te rigs kyi bdag po rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: is the maṇḍala of Māmakī, the purity of mind, the purity of the lord of the family.

original: de ltar lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dbang du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dbang du byas pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the maṇḍalas of the goddesses are brought under control.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje mchog ces bya ba ni m'a ma ka'i ste zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje mchog ces bya ba ni m'a ma ka'i ste zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'o //
translated: The supreme of the vajra space is Māmakī, seated on a moon maṇḍala.

original: autpala mthing gzhes bya ba ni 'dir autpala dmar po yin par bzhed de /
analyzed: autpala mthing gzhes bya ba ni 'dir autpala dmar po yin par bzhed de /
translated: The blue lotus is here taken to be a red lotus.

original: de yang / 'khor lo bzang dang autpala dmar po dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang / 'khor lo bzang dang autpala dmar po dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no //
translated: And that is stated by good wheel, red lotus, and so on.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni gsung rnam par dag pa gos dkar mo'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni gsung rnam par dag pa gos dkar mo'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The dharma maṇḍala is the maṇḍala of Pāṇḍaravāsinī, the purity of speech.

original: rdo rje chos ma zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo'o /
analyzed: rdo rje chos ma zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo'o /
translated: The Vajradharma is Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: autpala dmar po zhes bya ba ni chos kyi brdas snga ma bzhin du padma yin par bshad do //
analyzed: autpala dmar po zhes bya ba ni chos kyi brdas snga ma bzhin du padma yin par bshad do //
translated: The red lotus is explained as a lotus by the symbol of dharma, as before.

original: dngos grub dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar grub pa rnam par dag pa sgrol ma gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dngos grub dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar grub pa rnam par dag pa sgrol ma gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The maṇḍala of powers is the maṇḍala with Tārā as the principal deity, the purity of unfailing accomplishment.

original: de ltar lha mo rnams bshad nas //
analyzed: de ltar lha mo rnams bshad nas //
translated: Having explained the goddesses in that way,

original: khro bo rnams gsungs pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste me long lta bu rnam par dag pa las yang dag par byung ba'i bdag po ni gshin rje gshed de /
analyzed: khro bo rnams gsungs pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste me long lta bu rnam par dag pa las yang dag par byung ba'i bdag po ni gshin rje gshed de /
translated: he declares the wrathful ones, beginning with sun maṇḍala, and so on. The lord who arises from the purity of the mirror-like [wisdom] is Yamāntaka.

original: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas dbang bskur ba yin pa sngar bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas dbang bskur ba yin pa sngar bshad pa yin te /
translated: Yama, etc. are empowered by Vairochana, etc. as explained above,

original: de rnams ni de'i rigs dang yang dag par 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽de yang / rnam par snang mdzad thugs gtso bo //
analyzed: de rnams ni de'i rigs dang yang dag par 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir ro // de yang / rnam par snang mdzad thugs gtso bo //
translated: because they are connected with that family.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no //
translated: And that is stated by Vairochana is the chief of mind, etc.

original: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa gsungs pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa gsungs pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste //
translated: The statement of the desire kings, etc. is the sun mandala, etc.

original: 'di dag ni mi bskyod pas dbang bskur ba nyid de'i rigs las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di dag ni mi bskyod pas dbang bskur ba nyid de'i rigs las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: These are empowered by Akshobhya, because they arise from that family.

original: rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
translated: The knowledge wheel is the uṣṇīṣa chakravartin.

original: 'di dag srung ba la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag srung ba la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: These should also be applied to the activities of protection, etc.

original: rdo rje ye shes sgrub pa nyid gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes sgrub pa nyid gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The statement of the very attainment of vajra knowledge is the buddhas, etc.

original: 'gog pa ni bgegs rnams nye bar gcod pa'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa ni bgegs rnams nye bar gcod pa'o //
translated: Cessation is the cutting off of obstacles.

original: khro bo'i 'khor lo de las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo nges par 'dzin pa ni dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin mi phyed pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khro bo'i 'khor lo de las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo nges par 'dzin pa ni dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin mi phyed pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: From that wheel of wrath, the wheel of wrath, the yogin who possesses the wheel of the retinue of deities of the mandala, will attain the gnosis of indivisible concentration.

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor @200a * //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor @200a * //
translated: The vajra wheel

original: zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor te de 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor te de 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: is the indivisible wheel, and its accomplishment is the meaning of “will be accomplished.🔽”

original: le'u bcu gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bcu gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary to the thirteenth chapter.🔽Chapter Fourteen

original: // / le'u bcu bzhi par zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / le'u bcu bzhi par zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The Teaching of the Rituals of Pacification, and so forth

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, in order to teach the rituals of pacification, and so forth, [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then, the great hero, Vajra Speech,” and so on.

original: zhi ba'i dam tshig mchog ces bya ba ni zhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i dam tshig ni spyan te /
analyzed: zhi ba'i dam tshig mchog ces bya ba ni zhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i dam tshig ni spyan te /
translated: The supreme commitment of pacification is the commitment that serves as the cause of pacification, which is Locanā.

original: de'i mchog ni rnam par snang mdzad yin pas ming de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i mchog ni rnam par snang mdzad yin pas ming de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Since the supreme of those is Vairocana, it is called by that name.

original: spyan lta bu nyid du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spyan lta bu nyid du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de bzhin du 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang rigs kyi bdag po'i ting nge 'dzin bzung nas rigs de las byung ba'i sngags brjod pa ci rigs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang rigs kyi bdag po'i ting nge 'dzin bzung nas rigs de las byung ba'i sngags brjod pa ci rigs par shes par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should understand the following mantras, which are born from that family, by taking the samādhi of the lord of the family, and reciting the mantra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas spyan te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas spyan te /
translated: The queen of all the Tathāgatas is the Buddha eye of Vairocana, the perfect Buddha who is the nature of all.

original: 'di dag gis ni sgra'i bdag nyid can gyi sngags spyan gnyis tha mi dad par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni sgra'i bdag nyid can gyi sngags spyan gnyis tha mi dad par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is said to be the mantra of the two eyes, which have the nature of sound, without distinction.

original: de bzhin du 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should apply this to the following.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni drag shul bsgrub par rnam par dgod pa rnams la ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas zhi ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni drag shul bsgrub par rnam par dgod pa rnams la ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas zhi ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: The Buddhas means that one should generate peace, according to the previously explained method, for those who are established in the performance of wrathful deeds.

original: zhi ba'i las ni 'di'i bya ba'i gtso bo yin par bshad kyi gzhan dag la yang khyab par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhi ba'i las ni 'di'i bya ba'i gtso bo yin par bshad kyi gzhan dag la yang khyab par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: The pacifying rite is explained as the principal activity of this [buddha-body], but it is also applied to the others.

original: de yang 'di nyid na sku mdog ser po bsam zhing gdan dang gzhal yas khang la sogs pa'i dbye bas ji ltar mos pa bzhin du rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang rab tu sgrub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'di nyid na sku mdog ser po bsam zhing gdan dang gzhal yas khang la sogs pa'i dbye bas ji ltar mos pa bzhin du rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang rab tu sgrub par byed pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, one should imagine that [the buddha-body] is yellow in color, and that it accomplishes the activities of increase, etc., in accordance with one's aspiration, by the division of the seat, the celestial mansion, etc.

original: lha thams cad ni las thams cad mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lha thams cad ni las thams cad mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because all the deities perform all the activities.

original: las 'di dag la cho ga gang gis sbyar bar bya bde ni le'u bcu gsum pa nyid du bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: las 'di dag la cho ga gang gis sbyar bar bya bde ni le'u bcu gsum pa nyid du bshad pa yin te /
translated: The rite by which these activities are applied is explained in chapter thirteen,

original: de'i rjes su 'brangs nas gzhan dag la yang shes par bya'o //🔽rdo rje dam tshig bskul mdzad ma //
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'brangs nas gzhan dag la yang shes par bya'o // rdo rje dam tshig bskul mdzad ma //
translated: and one should understand the others by following that.🔽The one who impels the vajra vow

original: zhes bya ba ni ba slang ba'i tshigs su bcad pas nur nur por gyur pa las rdo rje 'chang ba slong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ba slang ba'i tshigs su bcad pas nur nur por gyur pa las rdo rje 'chang ba slong bar byed pa'o //
translated: is the one who impels Vajradhara from the kalala stage with the verse of the plough.

original: shi ba sos par byed pa zhes bya ba ni spyan gyi sbyor ba cho ga bzhin du byas la rang gi sngags dang bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang spel zhing yi ge gsum gyi nang du chud par bzlas la /🔽shi ba snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar bzhag nas rang gi snying gnas su grub pa'i rdo rje'i lcags kyu phyung la des shi ba de'i @200b rnam par shes pa sring pa bar mdo'i bdag nyid can nam skye gnas su chud pa /
analyzed: shi ba sos par byed pa zhes bya ba ni spyan gyi sbyor ba cho ga bzhin du byas la rang gi sngags dang bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang spel zhing yi ge gsum gyi nang du chud par bzlas la / shi ba snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar bzhag nas rang gi snying gnas su grub pa'i rdo rje'i lcags kyu phyung la des shi ba de'i @200b rnam par shes pa sring pa bar mdo'i bdag nyid can nam skye gnas su chud pa /
translated: The one called reviving the dead is as follows: Having performed the procedure of the eye, one repeats one's mantra and the name of the person to be revived, and having inserted the three syllables,🔽one places the dead person in one's heart as before and extracts the vajra hook that is accomplished in one's heart.

original: dri ma med pa'i mar me mi g-yo ba lta bur bkug nas snying gi dbus der bcug la /
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i mar me mi g-yo ba lta bur bkug nas snying gi dbus der bcug la /
translated: Having summoned the consciousness of the dead person, which is like a flickering lamp, into the center of one's heart,

original: mo ha ra ti zhes bya ba'i sngags bkod nas /
analyzed: mo ha ra ti zhes bya ba'i sngags bkod nas /
translated: one should place the mantra moharati there.

original: sngags kyi 'ong zed rnams kyis lus de mi snang bar byas la bsgrub par bya ba de'i ming gi yi ge dang po las bskyed pa spyan lta bur yongs su gyur par bsams la /
analyzed: sngags kyi 'ong zed rnams kyis lus de mi snang bar byas la bsgrub par bya ba de'i ming gi yi ge dang po las bskyed pa spyan lta bur yongs su gyur par bsams la /
translated: Having made the body of the dead person invisible with the palms of one's mantra, one should imagine that it is transformed into an eye like that of Tara, generated from the first letter of the name of the person to be revived.

original: phung po la sogs pa gang bar byas te /
analyzed: phung po la sogs pa gang bar byas te /
translated: Having filled the aggregates, etc.,

original: de'i lus la phreng ba'i sngags 'dis phyi dang nang du bar mtshams med par khyab par gyur par bsgom mo //
analyzed: de'i lus la phreng ba'i sngags 'dis phyi dang nang du bar mtshams med par khyab par gyur par bsgom mo //
translated: one should meditate on the body pervaded by the garland mantra, without interval, inside and out.

original: de nas sngags las snga ma bzhin du spos pa'i 'od zer gyi gong bu dang pa la sogs pa byas par gyur pas shi ba 'tsho bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas sngags las snga ma bzhin du spos pa'i 'od zer gyi gong bu dang pa la sogs pa byas par gyur pas shi ba 'tsho bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Then, as before, from the mantra, one should imagine a mass of light rays, etc., and the dead person is revived.

original: m'a ma k'i sngags bshad pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: m'a ma k'i sngags bshad pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to explain the mantra of Māmakī, [the Bhagavān] declares thereupon, etc.

original: 'di'i mdzad pa gsungs pa ni rdo rje srung bzhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di'i mdzad pa gsungs pa ni rdo rje srung bzhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The performance of this [mantra] is declared with the vajra protection, etc.

original: 'di yang spyan bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di yang spyan bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: This [mantra] should be accomplished like the eye [mantra].

original: snying gar dgod pa'i sbyor ba la yang snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: snying gar dgod pa'i sbyor ba la yang snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The application of placing [the mantra] in the heart should be applied as before.

original: gal te ro langs la sogs pa bsgrub pa la ni rang gi lha'i sbyor ba dang ji lta ba bzhin du ldan pas /
analyzed: gal te ro langs la sogs pa bsgrub pa la ni rang gi lha'i sbyor ba dang ji lta ba bzhin du ldan pas /
translated: If one is accomplishing a zombie, etc., one should be endowed with the application of one’s deity,

original: rang gi mgo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje bsgreng nas gnas pa mgo bor bsams la /🔽de'i lte ngar m'a ma k'i'i rnam par bsgoms nas /
analyzed: rang gi mgo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje bsgreng nas gnas pa mgo bor bsams la / de'i lte ngar m'a ma k'i'i rnam par bsgoms nas /
translated: One should imagine that one's head is a vajra standing upright, arisen from the syllable hum on a moon disk, and that at its center is Mamaki.🔽The wisdom goddess, standing on the moon at the heart, is arrayed with the mantra rosary.

original: ye shes kyi lha mo thugs ka'i zla ba la gnas pa phreng ba'i sngags bkod la de las byung zhing zlos pa rdo rje phra mo spros pas yan lag thams cad rdo rje'i go bskon par bdag nyid bsgoms na srung ba gzhig tu med par 'gyur ro //🔽las rnams rtag tu rab bsgrub pa //
analyzed: ye shes kyi lha mo thugs ka'i zla ba la gnas pa phreng ba'i sngags bkod la de las byung zhing zlos pa rdo rje phra mo spros pas yan lag thams cad rdo rje'i go bskon par bdag nyid bsgoms na srung ba gzhig tu med par 'gyur ro // las rnams rtag tu rab bsgrub pa //
translated: One should imagine that one's body is completely covered with vajras, emitted from that and recited vajra dust.

original: zhes bya ba ni spyan la sogs pa'i las rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni spyan la sogs pa'i las rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: One should always accomplish the rites means that one accomplishes the rites of Locana and so forth.

original: rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The great vajra is Vajrasattva.

original: de ni 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la yang 'di ni stobs byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la yang 'di ni stobs byed pa yin no //
translated: He is the one who empowers those who are frightened.

original: de bas na gdon thams cad kyis 'jigs pa rnams la las thams cad du 'di ni bshad ma thag pa'i tshogs bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na gdon thams cad kyis 'jigs pa rnams la las thams cad du 'di ni bshad ma thag pa'i tshogs bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, for those who are afraid of all the spirits, this protection of the assembly, just explained, is to be done in all activities.

original: gos dkar mo'i sngags bshad pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gos dkar mo'i sngags bshad pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: To explain the mantra of Pāṇḍaravāsinī, [the Bhagavān] declares thereupon, etc.

original: chos ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Dharma is the powers, fearlessnesses, etc.

original: rgyas pa ni rgyas bar gyur pa nyid do //
analyzed: rgyas pa ni rgyas bar gyur pa nyid do //
translated: Expansion is the very expansion.

original: stobs ni sems can nyam chung ba rnams la gang stobs mdzad pa dang / mdzod @201a * //🔽chen po dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: stobs ni sems can nyam chung ba rnams la gang stobs mdzad pa dang / mdzod @201a * // chen po dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Strength is what is done for weak sentient beings, and the great treasure.

original: zhi ba la sogs pa mdzad pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa mdzad pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is what is done for peace, etc.

original: de yang ji ltar gdan ser po la sogs pa'i gos dkar mo'i sbyor ba byas la /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar gdan ser po la sogs pa'i gos dkar mo'i sbyor ba byas la /
translated: Moreover, having made the application of Pāṇḍaravāsinī, with a yellow seat, etc.,

original: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa 'dod pa rnams snga ma bzhin du ye shes kyi lha mo'i snying gar bkod la /
analyzed: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa 'dod pa rnams snga ma bzhin du ye shes kyi lha mo'i snying gar bkod la /
translated: those who desire the powers, fearlessnesses, etc., should arrange them in the heart of the knowledge goddess, as before.

original: rang gi phreng ba'i sngags gdon par bya zhing snga ma bzhin du spro ba dang / 'od zer gyi gong bu dbab pa dang / dbang bskur ba la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi phreng ba'i sngags gdon par bya zhing snga ma bzhin du spro ba dang / 'od zer gyi gong bu dbab pa dang / dbang bskur ba la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: the descent of the mass of light rays, the bestowal of initiation, and so forth.

original: de nas bsgrub par bya ba rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas bsgrub par bya ba rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then the object of attainment will be expanded.

original: bzlas pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i bsgom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sngags gdon pa nyid kyi ste /
analyzed: bzlas pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i bsgom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sngags gdon pa nyid kyi ste /
translated: By mere recitation means by the mere recitation of the mantra preceded by the meditation as taught,

original: phyi rol la ltos pa med par ro //
analyzed: phyi rol la ltos pa med par ro //
translated: without regard to external factors.

original: sgrol ma'i sngags gsungs pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sgrol ma'i sngags gsungs pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The mantra of Tara is stated by Then, and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje dang sde chen po la sogs pa dbang du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje dang sde chen po la sogs pa dbang du byed pa yin no //
translated: It is the subjugation of Buddhavajra, Mahāsenā, and so forth.

original: de la cho ga ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la cho ga ni 'di yin te /
translated: The rite is as follows.

original: sgrol ma'i sbyor ba sku mdog dang rgyan la sogs pa dmar po dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sgrol ma'i sbyor ba sku mdog dang rgyan la sogs pa dmar po dang ldan pa /
translated: One should perform the yoga of Tara, red in color, with ornaments, and so forth.

original: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas la ye shes kyi lha mo'i snying ga'i zla bar sngags kyi phreng ba'i kha dog dmar po mgo gyen du bltas pa bkod nas de'i 'od zer rnams dang / ye shes kyi lha mo'i snying ga'i padma la gnas pa'i yi ge t'am gi 'od zer rnams dang /
analyzed: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas la ye shes kyi lha mo'i snying ga'i zla bar sngags kyi phreng ba'i kha dog dmar po mgo gyen du bltas pa bkod nas de'i 'od zer rnams dang / ye shes kyi lha mo'i snying ga'i padma la gnas pa'i yi ge t'am gi 'od zer rnams dang /
translated: Having performed the rite just as it is, one should arrange the red rosary of the mantra facing upward in the moon at the heart of the knowledge goddess.🔽One should also visualize the light rays of the letter taṃ or the letter ḥ located in the lotus at the heart of the knowledge goddess,

original: rang gi mtshan ma dmar po la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i skyes bu de'i ming gi yi ge dang po las bskyed pa'i snying ga'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan ma dmar po la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i skyes bu de'i ming gi yi ge dang po las bskyed pa'i snying ga'i gnas su'o //
translated: and also the light rays of one’s own red sign, and so on.

original: bud med ni padmar yang dag par bskul la /
analyzed: bud med ni padmar yang dag par bskul la /
translated: One should also summon the woman to the lotus.

original: rang gi snying ga'i sngags kyi phreng ba skye gnas las phyung ste /
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i sngags kyi phreng ba skye gnas las phyung ste /
translated: One should extract the rosary of the mantra from one’s heart and place it in the secret part of the woman.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i khar bcug la /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i khar bcug la /
translated: One should place it in the heart of the woman to be enchanted.

original: de'i sems zla ba dmar po lta bu blangs nas phyir log ste /
analyzed: de'i sems zla ba dmar po lta bu blangs nas phyir log ste /
translated: One should take her mind, which is like a red moon, and return.

original: ye shes kyi lha mo'i padma'i lam nas zhugs par gyur par bsams la bzlas brjod bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi lha mo'i padma'i lam nas zhugs par gyur par bsams la bzlas brjod bya'o //
translated: Imagine that you recite the mantra while the wisdom-being goddess enters through the path of the lotus.🔽

original: bsgrub par bya ba yang snying phrogs shing brgyal bar gyur pas /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba yang snying phrogs shing brgyal bar gyur pas /
translated: One should perform the recitation, imagining that the mantra enters the path of the lotus of the knowledge goddess and that the one to be subdued is robbed of his heart and faints.

original: rang gi rkang ba'i drung du 'bab par gyur par bsam mo //
analyzed: rang gi rkang ba'i drung du 'bab par gyur par bsam mo //
translated: One should imagine that he falls at one’s feet.

original: de ltar na 'di bran dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di bran dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, he becomes like a servant.

original: 'dir yang sv'a h'a'i gnas su dbang du byed pa'i gnas skabs la yi ge ho:zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang sv'a h'a'i gnas su dbang du byed pa'i gnas skabs la yi ge ho:zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Here, in place of svāhā, one should add the syllable hoḥ, which is the occasion for subjugation.

original: gal te mda'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'i lha mos las 'di byed na de'i tshe mda' des skyes pa'i snying ga dang / mgrin pa dbug pa dang / bud med kyi padma phug la lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin du bya'o zhes @201b khyad par du bya ba dag dpag bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te mda'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'i lha mos las 'di byed na de'i tshe mda' des skyes pa'i snying ga dang / mgrin pa dbug pa dang / bud med kyi padma phug la lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin du bya'o zhes @201b khyad par du bya ba dag dpag bar bya'o //
translated: If the goddess has the sign of an arrow, then at that time one should imagine that the arrow pierces the heart of a man and his throat, and it pierces the lotus of a woman. The rest is as before.

original: gal te yang gzhan dag dbang du byed na /
analyzed: gal te yang gzhan dag dbang du byed na /
translated: If one wants to subjugate others,

original: de'i tshe dbang du byed par 'dod pa de ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i padmar zla ba la bkod la /
analyzed: de'i tshe dbang du byed par 'dod pa de ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i padmar zla ba la bkod la /
translated: At that time, one who wishes to enthrall should place the one to be enthralled on a moon in the lotus at the heart of the gnosis being.

original: le'u bcu gsum pa las gsungs pa'i stobs dbab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga byas la /
analyzed: le'u bcu gsum pa las gsungs pa'i stobs dbab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga byas la /
translated: One should perform the rite of the descent of the power, and so forth, as taught in chapter 13.

original: de nas las 'di dag thams cad kyis kyang kha bskang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas las 'di dag thams cad kyis kyang kha bskang bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should complete all of these rites.

original: gshin rje gshed kyi sngags gsungs pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed kyi sngags gsungs pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mantra of Yamântaka is stated by “Then, the mantra of Yamântaka” and so forth.

original: cho ga ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: cho ga ni 'di yin te /
translated: The rite is as follows.

original: gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor bas bzlas pa las gsungs pa'i cho gas dpag tu med pa bzlas la /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor bas bzlas pa las gsungs pa'i cho gas dpag tu med pa bzlas la /
translated: One who is a yogin of Yamântaka should recite the mantra as taught in the rite of recitation an immeasurably great number of times.

original: de nas lhas rjes su gnang zhing bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas /
analyzed: de nas lhas rjes su gnang zhing bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas /
translated: Then, having been granted permission by the deity, one should recite the mantra one hundred thousand times.

original: ji skad du gsungs pa'i bung med kyi thod pa blangs la /
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs pa'i bung med kyi thod pa blangs la /
translated: Then, one should obtain a skull that is not of a human who has died.

original: de'i dbus su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris te /
analyzed: de'i dbus su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris te /
translated: In the center of that, one should draw an eight-petaled lotus standing on a wind mandala.

original: de'i lte bar dgug par byed pa'i bud med kyi gzugs brnyan gur kum la sogs pas bris nas /
analyzed: de'i lte bar dgug par byed pa'i bud med kyi gzugs brnyan gur kum la sogs pas bris nas /
translated: Having drawn the image of a woman with saffron, etc., in the center of that,

original: de'i snying gar phreng ba'i sngags 'di che ge mo a'a karsha ya zhes bya ba dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang spel zhing sv'a h'a'i gnas su dgug pa'i gnas skabs su yi ge dza:zhes bya ba bri bar byas la dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i snying gar phreng ba'i sngags 'di che ge mo a'a karsha ya zhes bya ba dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang spel zhing sv'a h'a'i gnas su dgug pa'i gnas skabs su yi ge dza:zhes bya ba bri bar byas la dgug par bya'o //
translated: one should write this mantra of the rosary in her heart, “So-and-so, come here!” and the name of the person to be summoned, and in place of the svaha, “Jva” in the case of summoning.

original: thod pa de yang rnal 'byor pa'i g-yas brkyang bas gnas pas na /
analyzed: thod pa de yang rnal 'byor pa'i g-yas brkyang bas gnas pas na /
translated: And that skull-cup is to be placed by the yogin with his right leg extended,

original: rkang pa g-yon pa bskum pas mnan la sngags 'di lan gnyis sam gsum du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rkang pa g-yon pa bskum pas mnan la sngags 'di lan gnyis sam gsum du brjod par bya'o //
translated: pressing down with his left leg drawn up, and this mantra is to be recited two or three times.

original: rang rang gi sngags las bskyed pa'i sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa de dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: rang rang gi sngags las bskyed pa'i sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa de dgug par bya'o //
translated: Those [women] standing on the wind maṇḍala should be summoned by the previously explained vajra hook, etc., generated from their respective mantras.

original: 'ong ba'i tshe yang 'tshe ba bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'ong ba'i tshe yang 'tshe ba bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: And when they come, in order to ward off harm,

original: spyan gyis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga dang po'o //
analyzed: spyan gyis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga dang po'o //
translated: this is the first rite as taught by the eye.

original: m'a ma k'i yang ji skad du gsungs pa'i cho gas bsrung bar sems par bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: m'a ma k'i yang ji skad du gsungs pa'i cho gas bsrung bar sems par bsgom par bya ste /
translated: One should meditate on the thought of protection by the previously described ritual of Māmakī.

original: de ltar na de ni bud med dgug pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na de ni bud med dgug pa yin no //
translated: Thus, that is the summoning of women.

original: skyes pa dgug pa la ni skyes pa'i thod pa la g-yon brkyang pas rkang pa g-yas pas mnan par bya ste /
analyzed: skyes pa dgug pa la ni skyes pa'i thod pa la g-yon brkyang pas rkang pa g-yas pas mnan par bya ste /
translated: In the summoning of men, one should extend the left foot over the skull of a man and press down with the right foot.

original: khyad par ni de yod do //
analyzed: khyad par ni de yod do //
translated: This is the difference.

original: bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags gsungs pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags gsungs pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The mantra of Vighnāntaka is stated with “Then, the mantra of Vighnāntaka, etc.”

original: sngags rnams kun gyi sbyor ba dang // zhes bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi tshogs bsgrub pa la bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: sngags rnams kun gyi sbyor ba dang // zhes bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi tshogs bsgrub pa la bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: “The application of all mantras” means that this very Blessed One should be applied in the accomplishment of the assembly of all deities,

original: bya ba thams cad mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽khyad @202a * //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir ro // khyad @202a * //
translated: because he performs all activities.

original: par yang gsungs pa ni /🔽rdo rje bskrad pa'i las rnams la //
analyzed: par yang gsungs pa ni / rdo rje bskrad pa'i las rnams la //
translated: The special [application] is also stated:

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: “In the activities of expelling with the vajra, etc.”

original: tshul bzhin zhes bya ba la cho ga ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: tshul bzhin zhes bya ba la cho ga ni 'di yin te /
translated: “Properly” means that the rite is as follows.

original: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas ro bsregs pa'i mes tshig pa'i sol ba dang / myos par byed pa'i shing gi sol ba dang / ba bla dang / aa rishta'i 'dab ma dang / dug dang / rkang pa g-yon pa'i srin lag gi khrag rnams gcig tu byas la btags te /
analyzed: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas ro bsregs pa'i mes tshig pa'i sol ba dang / myos par byed pa'i shing gi sol ba dang / ba bla dang / aa rishta'i 'dab ma dang / dug dang / rkang pa g-yon pa'i srin lag gi khrag rnams gcig tu byas la btags te /
translated: With the compound of the elixir of Rasayana, one should mix together the charcoal of a burnt corpse, the charcoal of an intoxicating tree,🔽the ashes of a crematory, the leaves of arishta, poison, and the blood of the left ring finger.

original: khva'i gshog sgro'i smyu gus dur khrod kyi ras la rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i ral gri'i 'khor lo rtsi bas brgyad pa bris la /
analyzed: khva'i gshog sgro'i smyu gus dur khrod kyi ras la rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i ral gri'i 'khor lo rtsi bas brgyad pa bris la /
translated: With a pen made of a crow’s wing, one should draw on a cloth from a charnel ground a sword wheel with eight spokes on a wind maṇḍala.

original: de'i lte bar bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan bris nas /
analyzed: de'i lte bar bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan bris nas /
translated: In the center of that, one should draw the effigy of the person to be subdued.

original: de'i snying gar phreng ba'i sngags che ge mo autstsha ta ya zhes bya ba 'di dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i ming du spel ba bris la /
analyzed: de'i snying gar phreng ba'i sngags che ge mo autstsha ta ya zhes bya ba 'di dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i ming du spel ba bris la /
translated: In its heart, one should write the mantra garland with the words “So-and-so, be destroyed!” and the name of the person to be subdued.

original: gnyi ga yang dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang dgug par bya'o //
translated: Both should be summoned.

original: bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan par brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas la /
analyzed: bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan par brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas la /
translated: Recite the incantation one hundred and eight times, including the words of entreaty.

original: ras de ma mo'i gnas la sogs par brkos la sba bar bya'o //
analyzed: ras de ma mo'i gnas la sogs par brkos la sba bar bya'o //
translated: One should bury that cloth in the abode of the mātṛs and so forth.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi dpung dag kyang skrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi dpung dag kyang skrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, even the army of the buddhas will be expelled.

original: 'dir yang sngon du bsnyen pa la phreng ba'i sngags sgra ji lta ba bzhin du bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang sngon du bsnyen pa la phreng ba'i sngags sgra ji lta ba bzhin du bzla bar bya'o //
translated: Here, too, during the prior approximation, one should recite the mantra of the rosary as it is.

original: las kyi tshe ni ma h'a ga na pa ti dzi bi ta aanta ka r'a ya zhes bya ba bton la de'i gnas su bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang spel bar bya'o//
analyzed: las kyi tshe ni ma h'a ga na pa ti dzi bi ta aanta ka r'a ya zhes bya ba bton la de'i gnas su bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang spel bar bya'o//
translated: At the time of the rite, one should recite “mahāgaṇapati jīvita anta kara ya” and insert the name of the victim in place of “anta kara ya.”

original: sv'a h'a'i gnas dang bskrad pa'i gnas skabs su yi ge h'um dam phat dam gnyi ga dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sv'a h'a'i gnas dang bskrad pa'i gnas skabs su yi ge h'um dam phat dam gnyi ga dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the place of svāhā and in the context of expulsion, one should employ either the syllable hūṃ or phaṭ.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang las dang rjes su mthun par sa bon gzhan dag yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang las dang rjes su mthun par sa bon gzhan dag yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should see that other seeds are appropriate for other rites in accordance with the rite.🔽And that is:🔽Pacification, increase, subjugation, attraction,

original: de yang / zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug / sdang dang bskrad dang mngon spyod la //
analyzed: de yang / zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug / sdang dang bskrad dang mngon spyod la //
translated: enmity, expulsion, and assault.

original: aom sv'a h'a ho dza:h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom sv'a h'a ho dza:h'um h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ svāhā hoḥ jaḥ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: sngags kyi mthar yang bskul bar bya //
analyzed: sngags kyi mthar yang bskul bar bya //
translated: And at the end of the mantra, one should impel.

original: zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation.

original: yang na zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ming yang spel bar bya ba dang / thog ma dang tha mar bskul bar bya ba 'di bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan yin no //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ming yang spel bar bya ba dang / thog ma dang tha mar bskul bar bya ba 'di bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan yin no //
translated: Or, by the word “or,” it is said that one should also increase the name and impel at the beginning and end. This is another way.

original: sngags kyi tshig re re zhing ming dang spel bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di yang rnam pa gzhan pa gcig yin no //
analyzed: sngags kyi tshig re re zhing ming dang spel bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di yang rnam pa gzhan pa gcig yin no //
translated: And this is another way: for each mantra word, one should increase the name.

original: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags gsungs pa ni /
translated: The mantra of Aparajita is stated:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, etc.

original: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba de la cho ga ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba de la cho ga ni 'di yin te /
translated: According to the rite. Therein, the rite is as follows.

original: khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rnal 'byor pas srin po la sogs pas zil gyis mnan pa'i bsgrub @202b par bya ba'i lus las srin po la sogs pa yid kyis bkug ste /
analyzed: khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rnal 'byor pas srin po la sogs pas zil gyis mnan pa'i bsgrub @202b par bya ba'i lus las srin po la sogs pa yid kyis bkug ste /
translated: The practitioner of Aparajita, the wrathful one, mentally draws the rakshasa, etc. from the body of the victim who is oppressed by the rakshasa, etc.

original: rkang pa gnyis thabs dang shes rab tu gyur pas /
analyzed: rkang pa gnyis thabs dang shes rab tu gyur pas /
translated: By the two feet, which are method and wisdom,

original: mi bskyod pas kun du btsir lam nye bar bya zhing /
analyzed: mi bskyod pas kun du btsir lam nye bar bya zhing /
translated: One should press with Akṣobhya, and

original: che ge mo raksha siddhi bhyo mo tsa ya zhes bya ba'i bskul tshig dang ldan par sngags kyi tshig 'don par bya'o //
analyzed: che ge mo raksha siddhi bhyo mo tsa ya zhes bya ba'i bskul tshig dang ldan par sngags kyi tshig 'don par bya'o //
translated: recite the mantra syllables together with the incantation “For the sake of the accomplishment of such-and-such, I summon you!”

original: de nas du zhing yan lag gcog pa la sogs pa'i yid ches pa ston pa sngon du 'gro bas gtong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas du zhing yan lag gcog pa la sogs pa'i yid ches pa ston pa sngon du 'gro bas gtong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, weeping and showing confidence in the cutting off of limbs and so forth, he will be released.

original: 'di nyid ni sbrul la sogs pa'i dug la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni sbrul la sogs pa'i dug la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should also be applied to poison from snakes and so forth.

original: yang na nges 'dzin pa nyid du 'dod na /🔽de'i tshe de'i sbyor ba nyid kyis mar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la dur khrod kyi sol bas 'gegs te shi ba'am /
analyzed: yang na nges 'dzin pa nyid du 'dod na / de'i tshe de'i sbyor ba nyid kyis mar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la dur khrod kyi sol bas 'gegs te shi ba'am /
translated: Or, if one wishes to definitely hold him,

original: mtshon gyis bsad pa gang yang rung ba'i thod pa la yi ge h'um las byung ba /
analyzed: mtshon gyis bsad pa gang yang rung ba'i thod pa la yi ge h'um las byung ba /
translated: at that time, by just the application of it, on the eighth or fourteenth day of the waning moon, one should block the skull of someone who died in a charnel ground with charnel ground ash, or of someone who was killed by a weapon.🔽From the syllable hūṃ,

original: 'jigs su rung ba'i mche ba gtsigs pa /
analyzed: 'jigs su rung ba'i mche ba gtsigs pa /
translated: he arises as a terrifying being with bared fangs,

original: skra gyen du brjes la /
analyzed: skra gyen du brjes la /
translated: with hair standing upward,

original: lag pa g-yas par ro langs kyi chu gri thogs pa /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas par ro langs kyi chu gri thogs pa /
translated: holding a zombie’s knife in his right hand,🔽and a skull full of blood in his left hand.

original: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub byed pa'i srin po bris la /
analyzed: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub byed pa'i srin po bris la /
translated: Draw a rākṣasa making a threatening gesture with his left hand.

original: de'i snying gar dug dang rus pa'i phye ma dang / mthe'u chung gi khrag gis che ge mo grihna h'um phat ces bya ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i sngags bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i snying gar dug dang rus pa'i phye ma dang / mthe'u chung gi khrag gis che ge mo grihna h'um phat ces bya ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i sngags bri bar bya'o //
translated: In his heart write the mantra with the words “Seize so-and-so” along with the syllables gṛhṇa hūṃ phaṭ, using poison, bone-ash, and blood from the ring finger.

original: thod pa gnyis par bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes kyi sa dang / ro bsregs pa'i sa dang / thal ba dang / svol  ba dang rdo rje chu dang bsnos pas bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
analyzed: thod pa gnyis par bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes kyi sa dang / ro bsregs pa'i sa dang / thal ba dang / svol  ba dang rdo rje chu dang bsnos pas bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
translated: In the second skull-cup, make an effigy of the victim using earth from his footprints, earth from a charnel ground, ash, and śrīkhaṇḍa, mixed with vajra water.

original: de'i snying gar dug dang rus pa'i phye ma dang / mdzum mo'i khrag dang / ming dang sngags su bcas pa bris pa'i t'a la'i lo mar bcug la /
analyzed: de'i snying gar dug dang rus pa'i phye ma dang / mdzum mo'i khrag dang / ming dang sngags su bcas pa bris pa'i t'a la'i lo mar bcug la /
translated: In its heart, insert a palāśa leaf inscribed with the victim’s name and mantra along with poison, bone-ash, and blood from the ring finger.

original: gnyi ga yang bkug ste /
analyzed: gnyi ga yang bkug ste /
translated: Summon both [skull-cups].

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan de'i 'og tu gzhag par byas la /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan de'i 'og tu gzhag par byas la /
translated: Place the effigy of the victim under the other one.

original: des mnan cing bzung bar bsams la /
analyzed: des mnan cing bzung bar bsams la /
translated: Imagine that it is pressed down and held.

original: bsgyings pa dang bcas pas sngags dur khrod du nam phyed na bzlas brjod bya'o //
analyzed: bsgyings pa dang bcas pas sngags dur khrod du nam phyed na bzlas brjod bya'o //
translated: With a proud attitude, one should recite the mantra at midnight in a charnel ground.
